pitā paṇḍuṅku āmbhe dekhi na pārilu bhala kari
dhr̥tarāṣṭa cittare antara dhaile na bichāri | 162 |
hastinā puruṁ bāhāra kari dileka āmbhanta
mahā gahana bane paśilu indra ye praśasta | 163 |
ẏeteka kaṣṭaku hāde ẏehāra puṇa ẏeḍeka kathā
kabāṭa kiḷi śutilā pāiluṁ baḍa byathā | 164 |
gobinde boile uṭha uṭha ho māruti
āmbhara chāmure kaha kebaṇa tora gati | 165 |
bhīmasena boilā śuṇa ho bāsudeba
hastinā sabhāẏe muṁ pāili aneka abhāba | 166 |
āstāne driyodhana bolai āmbhara pañchupitā
upahāsa kari boilā dhika dhika tohora mātā kontā | 167 |
āho ẏe bacana māna kāhāra beḷe sahu
prāṇa bisarjibi śarīra pache mora yāu | 168 |
kūṭa bacana brahmahatyā doṣa saṅge sari
anagr̥ha nātha daẏā mote karithāa śrīhari | 169 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa yujheṣṭhiṅka hoilā kāśīdeatā
tāhāṅka draśana kale muṇohi karai nityā | 170 |

div.note: anāsta hoibuṁ hari āmbhe chāri bhrāthe |
ayogya puruṣa hoi hoilu āmbhe janma |
āmbhara chāmure kaha kebaṇa tora bikr̥ti |
prāṇa bisarjibi gridhinī pache māṁsa khāu |

lg.l: se andha āgyāṁ puṇi diai āmbhaṅku
yatane paṭhiāiṁ sabhāre āmbhaṅku jhiṁghāsa karibāku | 171 |
ẏe chāṇḍāḷa puṇi tāhā saṅgharai kemante
kiñchite heṁ āgyāṁ mote na diai kadāścite | 172 |
māra boli boile muṁ loṭāi āsibi se sabunti
bhīṣma bhurisabongā śalya ādi sakaḷa mahārathī | 173 |
chatrī kuḷe jāta hoi ẏe aṭai mahāpāpī
anugrateṇa aṇakopita ẏe aṭai adyāpi | 174 |
bhīmasenara bacana śuṇi bolanti acyuta
kabāṭa pheḍa māruti muṁ kahai ẏethira artha | 175 |
uṭhiṇa brikodara pheḍilā kabāṭa
bhīmasena bāsudeba ẏekānte hele bheṭa | 176 |

div.note: nārāẏaṇa boile se tote jhiṁghāsa kahile

lg.l: tu ẏebe kūṭa bacana nuāribu ki darpa thile | 177 |
bolai māruti muṁ na jāṇai nātha tāhā
keuṇa kathāṭi kahibā kāḷandīra prāṇanāhā | 178 |
gobinda pratibāca tu dharithaa hr̥dagate
pabana putra boli tote boliba yugate | 179 |
bhīmasena boilā muṁ na jāṇai kicchi
keuṇa kaḷaṅka khaṇḍi mote kahibā śrībatsi | 180 |
gobinde boile bhīmasenara agrate
basa he pabanasuta boli boliba se tote | 181 |
tāhāra bacana tu sabhāre na sahibu
āho golaka putra muṁ basuacchi ni bolibu | 181 |
lg.note: ẏe chāṇḍāḷa puṇi tāhā sahai kemante
kiñthite heṁ āgyāṁ na diai kr̥te |
tāṅku kaṭa bacana bola tohora śakya thile |
lg.l: ẏesaneka bacana yadi śuṇima dhr̥tarāṣṭi
sabhāre lajjā sinā se pāiba leuṭi | 183–5508 |
lg.head: {@duryyodhanara apamāna o pāṣāṇa gr̥ha nirmāṇa@}
lg.l: ẏesaneka buddhi yahuṁ kahile acyuta
anukṣaṇe bhīmasena goṣi bolai golaka putra, golaka putra | 1 |
kahiṁṇa nārāẏaṇa gale antardhāne
golaka putra, golaka putra glai snāhāna bhojane | 2 |
anna guḍāẏe bhmañjai mahā roṣe
golaka putra, golaka putra bolai haraṣe | 3 |
āñchobana sāri śaẏana thāne bije
golaka putra, golaka putra boli mane mane heje | 4 |
rātra yahuṁ hoilā tini pahara ye āsi
pāhānti ki nidrā ghārilā pabanara śiṣi | 5 |
ttakṣaṇe paśorilā pāṇḍaba sundara
uṭhi caukati darāṇḍai śaẏana mandira | 6 |
hā hā pada goṭi galā mora keuṇa kati
loḍante sahadebaṅku hāboḍila yāiṁ jhāti | 7 |
ẏe ke ṭi boli ye uṭhi basilā sahadeba
bhīmasena bolai keuṇa nāma goṭi kahile bāsudeba | 8 |
sahadeba boile se golaka putra boli
nistarili nistarili bābu re harāilāra pāili | 9 |
golaka putra golaka putra boluacchi mane mane
raẏaṇī pahilā uṭhilā bhīmasena | 10 |
lg.note: sabhāre lajjā pāi se yāi sinā uṭhi |
lg.l: bahana snāhāna sārilā haraṣe
golaka putra, golaka putra hr̥da madhye ghoṣe | 11 |
mahā haraṣa hoi bolai yujheṣṭhiṅki
chāla svāmī ! dekhi yibā dhr̥tarāṣṭa tahiṁki | 12 |
se yebe āmbhanta hoile biśvanātha debatā
deba pitr̥ chāḍi yebe hoilāi dhr̥tarāṣṭare bhagatā | 13 |
yujheṣṭhi gamitā karanti hastinā bhmabanaku
golaka putra, golaka putra boli bāṭa kaḍhāi yujheṣṭhi debaṅku ||
boḷanti yujheṣṭhi āre ki ki blu manda
na yuṇa bhāiṅkara tule mora lagāu kaḷi dvanda | 15 |
āgeṇa yujheṣṭhi pacheṇa kiraṭī
tāhāṅkara pache nakuḷa sahadeba beni goṭi | 16 |
pratidina yāānti ye dhr̥arāṣṭaṅku dekhibāku
saburi sache chālai bhīmasena kāhāku hiṁ samāda na debāku | 17 |
se dina āga hoi bhīmasena chālai bekhi begi
yujheṣṭhi debaṅku kośa dui chāḍi chālai garu tyāgī | 18 |
leuṭi kari chāhaṁi se bhīmasena
dekhilā pache achanti yujheṣṭhi rājana | 19 |
bhīmakai dekhile ye dharmara kumare
boile āja tu ta galu bega begare | 20 |
bhīmasena boile muṁ āga nohibi
tumbhe yebe kopa kara muṁ pache pache yibi | 21 |
saburi pachare thāi chālai māruti
golaka putra, gilaka putra bolai roṣamati | 22 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa bhmabane hoile parabeśa
namaskāra kale yāiṁ andha rājāra pāśa | 23 |
lg.note: golaka putra boli na chāḍai hr̥dagate |
lg.l: āsanare basa boli boile dhr̥tarāṣṭi
driyodhana pāśe yāi bijaẏe yujheṣṭhi | 24 |
dharmasuta basa boli boile kurubīra
aṇakopī nātha yāi basile sabhāra | 25 |
arjjunaku boile ho basa indra suta
āgyāṁ pramāṇe yāiṁ basila bīra pātha | 26 |
nakuḷa sahadebaṅku ye boile āgyāṁ abadhārī
nakuḷa sahadebaṅku ye boile āgyāṁ abadhārī
aśvinī kumāra sute basa boli boile daṇḍadhārī | 27 |
nakuḷa sahadeba basile sabhāẏe
pache parabeśa hela yāiṁ pabanatanaẏe | 28 |
driyodhana boilā pabana putra basa
āho golaka putra muṁ basucchi boli boilā haraṣa | 29 |
bhurisabongā bhīṣme hasile karatāḷi dei
ẏe heneka marama khaṇḍi tu bhiāilu kāhiṁ | 30 |
ẏesaneka kathā śuṇiṇa kurupati
bisarilā ātmā chahaṁi caukati | 31 |
aneka bisari lajjā pāilā māna ye gobinda
mathā poti mahābīra kapāḷe dilā kara dhinda | 32 |
takṣane āstānuṁ ḍeiṁ paḍilā kurupati
abhimāna pāi galā mānacatrabtatī | 33 |
bhitara āhuṭa bhmabane prabeśa hoilā
kapāṭa pāḍi rājā bisari śutilā | 34 |
muṇohira beḷe jaṇāile sūpakāre
loḍanti mānagobindaṅku ubhāri sabong dvāre | 35 |
sañjaẏe bidure ādi kari samaste heṁ parabeśa
bhīṣma bhurisabongāẏe miḷile yāi pāśa | 36 |
kabāṭa pheḍa bābu mānacatrabratī
ki nimante bikr̥ta baḍhāilu ẏe tohora mati | 37 |

div.note: bhitara āhuṭa bhmabana–bhitara kūṭa bhmabana, āṭu bhmabana, gachīri ghara |

lg.l: sūryya beḷe muṇohi karibā bābu uṭha
kathora dekhiṇa bije kale dhr̥tarāṣṭa | 38 |
ḍākanti pitā bābu uṭhare kurupati
tu māne mānagobinda uṭha catrabratī | 39 |
ki nimante kapāṭa kiḷi śutilu re bābu
tu se pañchu kaṭake pāḷantā aṭu sabu | 40 |
karṇṇa mahābīra ye dvāre dei ḍāka
kebaṇa nimante maitra tumbhara ẏeḍe tāpa | 41 |
kāhākaiṁ rājā nadilā sambhāṣi
āpaṇe gāndhārī ye bije kale āsi | 42 |
gāndhārī ḍāka dianti uṭhisi re bāḷa
tu se pañchu kaṭake aṭu mahīpāḷa | 43 |
tuhi se bhigyaṁbanta bāi hou kāhiṁ
samaste mūrkha ẏekā tuhi se bujhāi | 44 |
bābu tohora apaṇḍita paṇe pr̥thī hoilā bhāsi
tohora bichāraku ye na yogāi tāhā pakā nāśi | 45 |
kubuddhi kuśayyāẏe lakṣmī huai hāni
abhaẏe puruṣa tu kāhākaiṁ ẏeḍe abhimānī | 46 |
apaṇḍita lokaṅkara ẏesanaka gati
chatriṅki ẏemanta kathā ta nohai yugati | 47 |
tuhi ye saṅsāreṇa aṭuṁ daṇḍadhārī
aneka bujhāiṁ kahai mātā ye gāndhārī | 48 |
driyodhana boilā mātā go tote kahai biśvāsa
bhīmā sabhā madhye mote kahilā jhiṁghāsa | 49 |
manahiṁ se jāṇai go hr̥dare yete | pāpa
mātāhiṁ se jāṇaiṁ putrara yete bāpa | 50 |

div.note: toḷanti pitā bābu uṭha re kurupati | (pā)

lg.l: gāndharī boile bābu tuhi se manda kalu
āpaṇāra mandapaṇe samasta kāryya nāśa kalu | 51 |
yujheṣṭhi tohora yugate aṭai jyeṣṭha bhrātha
tāhāku nitye tu bolu basa ho dharmasuta | 52 |
se ki bidyamāne nohanti ki tora pañchu bhāi
āpaṇāra cchidra kathā āpaṇe se luchāi | 53 |
paṇḍu dhr̥tarāṣṭa ye nohanti nā bhinna
tote lāja nohai ki yujheṣthiṅka abhimāna | 54 |
sohodra jhiṁghāsa ye kalu tu yugate
kāḷeṇa pāpa āsi dūṣāilā tote | 55 |
driyodhana boilā mā go mohora pitā dhr̥tarāṣṭa
gāndhārasena duhitī tu bongśeṇa gariṣṭha | 56 |
pitā dhr̥tarāṣṭa gāndhārī mora mātā
golaka putra boli bhīmā bolai amarjitā | 57 |
bhīṣma bhurisabongāẏe hasile tāhā śuṇi
lāje apamāna pāili gosāmaṇī | 58 |
gāndharī boile tu paṇḍita mora putra
pāntabaṅku jhiṁghāsa kaluni ye bahuta | 59 |
āpaṇāra śarīre paḍicchi aṁsāi
paraku hasu kimpā nāsikāre hasta dei | 60 |
driyodhana boilā mā go ẏe artha kemanta
golaka putra kathā mote kahasi go māta | 61 |
gāndhārī boile bābu tu ẏebe muṇohi kara uṭha
muṇohi uttāre kahai ethira artha goṭi | 62 |
driyodhana boilā ẏemanta kaḷaṅka acchi yebe
kāhiṁki gupata karu kahu kinā ẏebe | 63 |
tahiṁra artha go śuṇile mahāmāẏī
tebe se uṭhiṇa muṁ karibi muṇohi | 64 |
gāndhārī boile bābu śuṇa pūbongra kathā
gāndharasena rājā aṭai ye mora pitā | 65 |
jyeṣṭha māsa amābai kr̥ttikā nakṣatre
se dina utapatti muṁ hoili yugate | 66 |
jāti uāṁsī ābara brahma asurī
kehi mote pradāna nohile ḍari kari | 67 |
dūra rājā mānanta bābu re pitā ye barilā
mohora nāme barile bāiśi rājā malā | 68 |
byāsaṅku hakāri gāndhārasena pucchai
byāse boile ẏehāku bibhā karibā golaka br̥kṣakai | 69 |
pitāṅkara madhya agaṇāẏe golaka br̥kṣa thilā
byāsaṅku nei tāhā gāndharasena dekhāilā | 70 |
āpaṇe byāse kanyābeśa karāile muku
barabeśa karāile se golaka br̥kṣaku | 71 |
mote pradāna karāile pāreśvaraṅka suta
golaka br̥kṣara ḍāḷe bānddhale mohora ḍāhāṇa hasta | 72 |
kuśare bandhana kale satyabsatīta bāḷa
śaṅkhe gāndhārasena lāiṁ dilā jaḷatiḷa | 73 |
mohora kara tāhāa tahiṁ tahiṁ lāgilā pratyakṣe
tatakṣaṇe malā se golaka mahābr̥kṣe | 74 |
tohora pitā brahma asura tāhāku kanyā ke diantā nāhiṁ
śate aṣṭauttara kanyā malāni tāhāra baraṇa chāhiṁ | 75 |
byāse thāi ẏehā ye āpaṇe bhiāile
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅku āṇi mote diāile | 76 |
ẏeheneka biśvāsa kathākehi na jāṇanti āna
byāse bāsudebehiṁ jāṇanti ẏesaneka bidhāna | 77 |
yāhā loḍilu bābu tu tāhāhiṁ pāilu
paraku cchidra kahi āpaṇā cchidra marama kaḍhāilu | 78 |
bhīmā yāhā kahilā se aṭai nicaẏe
śuṇiṇa biṣāda hoilā gāndhātanaẏe | 79 |
ẏete artha kemante jāṇilāka bhīmā
na jāṇi huḍili muṁ nāśili āpaṇāra sīmā | 80 |
niti prati bhīmā ẏe dipada boluthiba mote
ābara sabhāẏeṇa muṁ basibi kemante | 81 |
gāndhārasena pāmara kinā ẏemanta kr̥tya kalā
bidhabā kanyāku kemante mo pitākaiṁ dilā | 82 |
ẏeheneka pāpa kṣaṇe yebe hoilu tu jāta
pitā ghare paḍi kiṁpe na malu go māta | 83 |
ẏete boli karmaku ādari bīra uṭhi
snāhāna nitya karma ye sārilā dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 84 |
maḍhaphulire bije rājā mahābīra
sehidinu driyodhana na basai āstānara | 85 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīmasenara mukha chāhiṁ
driryyodhanaku anīti katha kahilu kisa pāiṁ | 86 |
bhīmasena boilā niti dina āmbhana karai jhiṁghāsa
aneka sahiluni āmbhe prati ye dibasa | 87 |
pāñchaṅkari pitā nāma dharai sabhāre
upahāsa karanti nā āmbhanta sakaḷa kurubīre | 88 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāhāra pitā dhr̥tarāṣṭa mātā ye gāndhārī
golaka putra tāhakaiṁ kimpā boilu na bichāri | 89 |
bhīmasena boilā deba hoiacchini sehi
nohile kiṁpā caḷantā kaḷaṅka yebe nāhiṁ | 90 |
śuṇiṇa tabada ye dharma ra nandana
mane mane toṣa hoile bhīmasena | 91 |
prabeśa yujheṣṭhi hoile indra praśasta pure
nitya karmeṇa sebanti se dhr̥tarāṣṭara paẏare | 92–5600 |

div.head: {@duryyodhanara pāṣāṇa gr̥ha nirmāṇa@}

lg.l: sehi dinu āstānare nāhiṁ jāṇa sabhā
ye yāhāra āstāne thānti sakaḷa rājadebā | 1 |
kūṭa kapaṭa chatrī ye mānacatrabratī
buddhibantā bhāgyabantā upāẏe catrabratī | 2 |
lohagiri boli ẏeka pabongta goṭiẏe
uccharga potā bistāra se aṭe kośamaẏe | 3 |
śiḷapī bindhaṇī mānanta samasta ruṇḍiāiṁ
śrībhmaje śāḍhī saraḷa aneka ratna dei | 4 |
rātrakāḷe pabongte se lagāilā nei
ẏe pabongta goṭi khāḷiba bhitare bhaṅgāi | 5 |
yatana kariba khola prāẏe kari
ẏekai duāre ye hoiba tāhāri | 6 |
ghara prāẏe kari kaiba ye sañchā
ẏete boli āgyāṁ dilā dhr̥tarāṣṭa batsā | 7 |
yojaneka bistāra hoibāka sañcha
uccharga heba dui yojana ye uñcha | 8 |
tahiṁki nibongāṇa kariba bajra kabāṭa ye goṭi
bāhāre thāi kiḷile se bhitare na phiṭi | 9 |

div.note: ẏe pabongta goṭi koriba bhitareṇa bhaṅgāi |

lg.l: jaṇake baratana kalā grāma pāñchakhaṇḍa
māsake barttana hoilā subarṇṇa ẏeka māḍha | 10 |
pāñcha uttara śareka lāgile bindhaṇi
kāṭanti paṣāṇa yene bajra kīṭa nibongāṇi | 11 |
dvādaśa baraṣe tāhā kaleka nirmita
saubhāgī nadī kūle saubhadra banasta | 12 |
ahiṁra kuḷe arabinda lohagiri
upāẏeṇa driyodhana tāhā pathara ghara kari | 13 |
ghaṭaṇa nirmita yetebeḷe hoilā sagpurṇṇa
bhitare pituḷinta bhiāile citra ye lekhana | 14 |
gupate karāilā tāhā na jāṇantā kehi
dineka driyodhana mātā gāndhārī āge kahi | 15 |
bho mātā mahāsatī āgyāṁ debā muku
muhiṁ yibi mātā go gāndhārasena rājyaku | 16 |
kemanta saṅpade go achai mora ajā
kemanta kariṇa se pāḷai janaprajā | 17 |
kathā pāśorile na jāṇile gāndhārī
yāa boli driyodhanaku āgyāṁ abadhārī | 18 |
dhuśāsana dr̥jaẏe karṇṇa śalya kr̥pa
aśasamā sahite achanti samsta ntupa | 19 |
ẏeteka saṅgara sanya kumāra kurupati
gāndhārasena rājyaku se caḷai taḍati | 20 |
rātra dibaseṇa karanti paẏāṇa
hastināku gāndhārasena rajya pandara śata yuṇa | 21 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ pandara dibase
kaṭake prabeśa yāiṁ hoile haraṣe | 22 |
bāratā pāiṇa se gāndhārasena nr̥pati
daṇḍa sanya gheni se pāchoṭi āsai taḍati | 23 |
baiḍuryya pabongta taḷe hoile bheṭā bheṭi
gāndharasena kuśaḷa bāratā pucchai dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 24 |
driyodhana boilā śuṇimā māta tāta
sanyabaḷa chāḍi tohora mohora hoibā ẏekānta | 25 |
pabongta upare yāiṁ basile ajā nāti
bongśādhika rājā tu aṭu catrabratī | 26 |
muhiṁ sahi nuārai yujheṣṭiṅka āradoḷi
se nimante ajā, aili tohora tule bhaḷi | 27 |
bhīmasena aneka jhiṁghāsa kalāka mote
muhiṁ tāhāra prāṇa tyāga karibi kemante | 28 |
bhūiṁ chuiṁ śrabaṇe hasta dilā gāndhāra
bābu yebaṇa kathā kahilu se dusaha agocara | 29 |
tohora beḷe pāṇḍabanta baḷabante nohuṁṭi ye sari
deba kaḷā gheni se pratakṣe abatari | 30 |
dharmara bīryye jāta se yebaṇa yujheṣṭhi
kara leuṭānte yāhāra leuṭai naba sr̥ṣṭi | 31 |
brikodara jāta hāde pabanara bīryye
kareṇa gadā dharile trāsai debarāje | 32 |
mahā baḷabantā se pratagyāṁ sārthuka bhīma
chaḍa lakṣa yojanre thāiṁ tāhākaiṁ trāsa karai yamā | 33 |
bāsabara nandana yebaṇa phālaguni
ẏekā nārājake trailokya parai se jiṇi | 34 |
nakuḷa boliṇa tāhāra yebaṇa anuja
ākāśe pāṭa acchi aśvinī kumāraṅka ātmaja | 35 |
tāhāra anuja ye sahadeba boli
bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā muṁ pratakṣe dekhili | 36 |
bābu mohora bacana śuṇa re mānagobinda
samaẏe bratithāa yuhheṣṭhiṅkare na kara tu dvanda | 37 |
driyodhana boilā tāta samara na karibi
upāẏe kariṇa hāde pāṇḍabanta māribi | 38 |
bhīmāra baḷa bīryyaku mohora bhaẏa nāhiṁ
yāhāku nīḷāmbara deba hoichanti sāhi | 39 |
gāndhārasena boilā bābu kebaṇa upāẏe
driyodhana boilā āsa dekhāibi debarāẏe | 40 |
gāndhārasena boilā yebe ailu mora pure
dinā pāñchasāta rahibu nā mohora pura mandire | 41 |
driyodhana boilā tāta kaṭāḷa nakara ye mote
pāṇḍabanta nāśa kale muṁ bratai niścinte | 42 |
samasta sanyamāna pathiāa tohora deśa
barga kuṭumbamāna gheni saṅgate mora āsa | 43 |
āpaṇāra śate putra gheniṇa gāndhāra
ābara chaẏāṇoi bhrātha gheniṇa bandhu saṅgara | 44 |
āpaṇāku lāi śaẏe satāṇoi jaṇa
driyodhana tule gāndhārasena karai paẏāṇa | 45 |
saubhadra bane yāi hoile prabeśa
lohagiri pabongtare miḷile tāra pāśa | 46 |
kūṭa kapaṭa rājā pheḍilā kabāṭa goṭi
āpaṇe bhitare yāi paśilā dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 47 |
tāhāku goḍāi ye paśile gāndhārasena
pitāra saṅgate paśile gāndhārasena putramāna | 48 |
driyodhana boilā bichāra kara pitā
bhīmāra gadāghāta ẏe sahibaṭi pabongtā | 49 |
ẏehā bho pitā bichāra kara br̥ḍha kari
kabāṭa pāḍibi pāṇḍabanta bhitare muṁ bhari | 50 |
dekhi bichāra karai gāndhārasena nr̥pati
bābu driyodhana tu upāẏe catrabratī | 51 |
tohora bole ẏehā hoilā nibongāṇi
pratakṣe diśuacchi indra bārasvatī pura jāṇi | 52 |
bhala kari pitāputra ẏehāku bichāra kara
kāhāra kisa buddhi kaha mohora āgara | 53 |
ẏeteka bacana kahi bāhāra dhr̥tirāṣṭi
bāhāre thāi pāḍilā bajra kīḷaṇī kabāṭa goṭi | 54 |
gāndhārasena boilā kabāṭa pheḍa bābu
sabonggyaṁ nātha tote buddhi dr̥śya sabu | 55 |
driyodhana boilā śuṇa ho gāndhāra
tumbhe nirutānta bairi aṭa ye mohora | 56 |
mātāku mohora yebaṇa kr̥tya kalu gāndhārasena rājā
bidhabā kanyā karāilu dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅka bhāriyā | 57 |
golaka br̥kṣa ye bibhākāḷe malā yugate
bidhabā kanyā pitāku mohora hilu tu kemante | 58 |
agnire dahana kiṁpe na kalu mahātamā
se kathā kaḷaṅka mote sabhāre boilā bhīmā | 59 |
tote māile muṁ pāśorai se kathā
tohora nimante mote hāde lajjā apramitā | 60 |
pāṇḍabaṅka nimante nibongāṇa nohai ẏe ghara
tohora nimante nibongāṇa karicchi ẏehu pura | 61 |
tu ẏebe niśinteṇa thāa yāuacchi muhiṁ
bajra yantra kīḷaṇī kiḷilā, ahuṁ galaka kurusāiṁ | 62 |
prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ āpaṇā nija deśa
snāhāna bhojana se karai haraṣa | 63 |

div.note: pāṇḍabaṅka nimante bhaṇḍi kahili tohora āgara |

lg.l: gāndharī bāratā pāile tathya kari
driyodhana sannidhye bije kale māheśvarī | 64 |
bābu pitāku mohora lāilu pathara ghare
āre sodara badhare paśilu bāḷuta pāmare | 65 |
gāndhārasena brtithile tote re parama hita
kebeheṁ bābu na bāhuḍai kalā karma kr̥tya | 66 |
driyodhana na śuṇai gāndhārīra bola
goṭiẏe kari driyodhana na kalu tuhi bhala | 67 |
yadyapi pitāku mohora kalu ẏeḍe kr̥tya
anna deuthāa tāhāra jībana thibā pariyanta | 68 |
driyodhana boilā māgo tohora bacane
debaiṁ anna yāhā māgilu toṣa mane | 69 |
mātāṅkara bacane āgyāṁ dilā kurubīra
basāṇa kala gāndhāraku nitye anna ẏeka bhāra | 80 |

div.note: kūṭare driyodhana na kalu bābu bhala |
pada “mātāṅkara bacane āgyāṁ dilā kurubīra |” pādānta pare bhinna pātha–
basāṇa kalā gāndhāraku niti anna daśa bhāra |
pāṇi tahiṁki diai dui bhāra lekhāẏeṁ
jaṇake pāṇi ye paḍai pāẏe pāẏe |
jaḷā kabāṭi bāṭe baḍhāi dianti partidina
āmbhaṅku dhari driyodhana dukha dilā puṇa

lg.l: ẏehimati dilā māsaka pūrṇṇa anna |
lg.note: puṇa kichu dina dui bhāra lekhāẏeṁ dilā anna |
puṇa bhāreka diai hasta ye āñjuḷā
lg.l: gāndharasena kahai mr̥tyu āsi nikaṭa hoilā |
bhāreka anna ābara pāṇi kaḷasāẏe
guṇḍiri jaḷā bāṭe baḍhāiṇa diẏe | 71 |
dekhiṇa gāndhārasena bichāra karai mane
anna śāstire male mukati nuhanti jane | 72 |
samasteheṁ pātanti ḍāhāṇa kara goṭi
jyeṣṭha putra śaṅkuni sabuṅkuhiṁ diai bāṇṭi | 73 |
jaṇake hoai poṣe piṣe anna
ghaḍāẏeka pāṇi caḷuẏe grāsa puṇa | 74 |
ẏesaneka niti prati diai kurubai
upāẏe śuṅkuni tahuṁ thokāẏe thokāẏe rakhithai | 75 |
bhāta puḍāẏe cakaṭi lepithāi kānthe
buddhi bhiāilā āpaṇā bratibānimante | 76 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho yugadhara
chaa māsa pariyante dilā anna ẏeka bhāra | 77 |
cha māsa antare puṇa buddhiẏeka kalā
aṅgāẏeka dia boli sūpakāraku boilā | 78 |
jyeṣṭha māsa śuklapakṣa cauṭhīra dina
āgyaṁẏe baḍhāi dilā adha bhāreka anna | 79 |
tāhā bāṇṭi bhmañjile samaste bikaḷe
thāḷiẏeka anna puṇi dilā antakāḷe | 80 |
tāhā dekhi bachāra karai nr̥pati gāndhārasena
bābu sabunti adoṣe nāśa kalāṭi driyodhana | 81 |
śaẏe satāṇoi jaṇaṅku thāḷiẏeka bhāta
ẏeteka āhāra kari ho bratibā kemanta | 82 |
driyodhanara ta āmbhe nohuṁ nā bairi
binā aparādhe kiṁpā āmbhanta nāśa kari | 83 |
ẏe mohora bongśa ye mābuacchi anamite
tāhāra bongśa kehu nāśa kariba ẏehimate | 84 |
ẏe thāḷika bhāta jaṇaka hiṁ bhmañja
pitr̥ kāryya kari driyodhana bongśa gañja | 85 |
gāndhārasena rājāra ẏesaneka bacna śuṇi
jyeṣṭhi putra śaṅkuni kahilā dr̥ḍha bāṇī | 86 |
tu yehne āgyāṁ dilu narasāiṁ
muhiṁ pāribi driyodhanara bongśa nāśa karāi | 87 |
gāndharasena boilā thāḷika anna khāa
saburi āṣya gheniṇa tu śubheṇa brati ṭhāa | 88 |
se thāḷika anna ye bhmañjai śaṅkuni
sabhiẏeṁ prāṇa paẏāṇa hoile abasāni | 89 |
śaẏe pañchāṇoi jaṇa hoile prāṇatyāja
śaṅkuni gheni brati acchi gāndhārasena rāja | 90 |
gāndhārasena pachārai śuṇa re śaṅkani
tu mohora jyeṣṭha putra aṭu mahāgyānī | 91 |
muhiṁ ye putra re rakṣā kali tote
driyodhanara bongśa tu nāśibu kemante | 92 |
śaṅkuni boilā tāta acchi ni mohora buddhi
tohora bacana kaha mote kemante kāryya siddhi | 93 |
tumbhe ta yāuacha buddhiẏe mote kaha
hr̥dare dharithibi tohora bacana sandeha | 94 |
gāndhārasena boilā śuṇasi mohora putra
muhiṁ yetebeḷe hoibi mr̥tyu parāpata | 95 |
ẏe mohora ḍāhāṇa karara paba asthi
tāhā yatana kari thoithibu na jāṇima kurupati | 96 |
ḍāhāṇa hāthara ḍāhāṇa paba goṭi
tāhā karāibu bābu paśā dui kāṭhi | 97 |
bāma hātara paba karāibu paśāra guṭi
karāibuṭi nibongāṇa yatana kari tiriśa goṭi | 98 |
abaśya driyodhana tote kariba baḍa jaṇe
rājāra tule basibu tu mahāmantrī paṇe | 99 |
bābu tu ta nāśa kari nuāribu tāhaku
paśā kheḷāibu tu driyodhana saṅge pāṇḍabaṅku | 100 |
āpaṇe pāḍibu tu kūṭa kapaṭa paśā
dāna paḍuthibaṭi tohora manīṣā | 101 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki harāibu jiṇāibu driyodhana
paśākheḷāi ye ghenāibu pāṇḍabaṅka rājya siṁhāsana | 102 |
atmā sahite hiṇāibu driyodhanaku
sabhāra taḷe nei basāibu pāṇḍabaṅku | 103 |
sambhābonge āstāne basithiba kururājā
sabhāra taḷaku keśa dhari aṇāibu pāṇḍabaṅkara bhāriyā | 104 |
bibasana karāibu āṇi mahāsabhā taḷe
se kathāmāna bhīmā lihithiba baikṣashale | 105 |
tahiṁra rāga ye gheniṇa bhīmasena
dr̥yodhanara bongśa nāśa kariba sāṁgrāmeṇa | 106 |
bābu tuhi raṇa yāgyaṁ karibu sahadebara haste
bhaṇañjāṅku marāi na rahibu kadācite | 107 |
jaḷa sthaḷa anaḷe kahuacchi tote
pāṇḍabe badha nohanti keuṇasi mate | 108 |
śaṅkuni boilā tāta kahilu yeuṇa kathā
debaṅku aśakya ẏe tohora bāratā | 109 |
ẏe tohora bhmaja ẏete puṇya karithilā kāhiṁ
saṅprate karāa mote ẏethira kathā kahi | 110 |
gāndhārasena boilā bābu ẏe retaẏā yugara kathā
śahasra śāhāsre muṁ aṭai nirjitā | 111 |
paśā kheḷile muṁ hārai pratidine
gaṅgākaiṁ sebā kali muṁ putra re paśāra abhimāne | 112 |
pañchadaśa baraṣa pariyante muṁ kali ghoa tapa
kaṭhora tape dekhili babu gaṅgāṅka sarūpa | 113 |
uttrāṅka tīrthe prasanna hoile dhabaḷāṅgī
boile gāndhārasena re bara māga begi | 114 |
muṁ boili go māta sudaẏā kara mote ādi nārī
tohora tahuṁ debu mote bijaẏa paśā sāri | 115 |
paśāre kehi mote nohibe jiṇantā
prasanne paśā sāra mote dile ādimātā | 116 |
bijaẏā paśā sāra bābu asanteṇa gheni
gaṅgā boile ẏe tora tahiṁ thiba baraṣa ye tini | 117 |
tini baraṣare tu tini bhmabana jiṇibu
kathā ruhāi āṇi mote bābu e bāhuḍāi debu | 118 |
gaṅgāhuṁ bijaẏā sāra gheni aili tanaẏe
aneka rājāṅku bābu re muṁ jiṇili paśāẏe | 119 |
dhana bhaṇḍāra āṇili ratha gaja pādānti
paśāra bhaẏe kehi naile mora kati | 120 |

div.note: bho māta siddha go mote kara ādi nārī |
tini baraṣaku āṇili sāta baraṣa galā

lg.l: loḍibāra bele gaṅgā sāra na pailā |
lg.note: na paiṇa gaṅgā debī śāpa anusari
yāa re gāndhārasena pathara ghare bongśa maru tohori |
lg.l: tini baraṣa uttāre muṁ utrāṅkura tīrthaku gali
gaṅgāṅku tusti kari muṁ bijaẏā paśā deli | 121 |
paśā ghenimāku debī pātileka hasta
binaẏa bhābe gosāmaṇīṅku yoḍili beni karapatra | 122 |
tu yebe prasanna hoilu māheśvabī muku
cirantana kathā rahu mohora bongśaku | 123 |
gaṅgā boile paśā pātilu yebaṇa karasthaḷe
tohora mr̥tukāḷe asthi ghenima tohora kumare | 124 |
ḍahāṇa hasta pabe kariba dui paśā kāṭhi
bāma hastara paba kariba paśāguṇḍi tiriśa goṭi | 125 |
tohora bongśaku ye rahiba cirantane
kehi jiṇantā nohibaṭi trailokya bhmabane | 126 |
gaṅgāra prasanna bābu nohai āna kalā
kahuṁ kahyṁ gāndhārasena prāṇatyāja hoilā | 127 |
pitāra bacane se kumāra śaṅkani
dui hastara asthi paba yatana kari gheni | 128 |
śaẏe chaẏāṇoi jaṇa ta prāṇatyāja hoilā
ẏekamātra śaṅkuni prāṇa se pāilā | 129 |
thāḷiẏeka anna ye deuthilā kurupati
anteṇa puṇa na dilā tāhā mūrkhamati | 130 |
kāchare śaṅkuni lepithilā yebaṇa anna
tāhā khāi prāṇa se rakhai pratidina | 131–5731 |
lg.note: īśvara tahiṁ ye bolaṇā mote kari
cirantana kathā kemante rahiba mohora bongśaku |
bāma hastara paba kariba guḷi ṣoḷa goṭi |
lg.head: {@śakunira mantrītva lābha@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare bilaṅka deśa rājā
agastiṅka caraṇa taḷe kalā dibya pūjā | 1 |
gāndhārasenara bongśa pathara ghare bhari
binā doṣe nāśa kalā kuru daṇḍadhārī | 2 |
śaẏe satāṇoi jaṇa sabonge gale nāśa
śaṅkuni mātraka ye rahilā abaśeṣa | 3 |
ẏethu anantare helā ye kebaṇa carita
bichāri āgyāṁ mote kahibā kumbhasuta | 4 |
kahanti kubhasuta śuṇimā bilaṅkādhi
kete dina antare se kurukuḷa nidhi | 5 |
dina prakr̥ti saṅskāra nimante rājana
ratna kaṭhāu caḍhi bije toṭā jagatīra sthāna | 6 |
saṅge ratnajharīre nīra dhari tāra dāsī
baṭa mūḷe rājana miḷilāka āsi | 7 |
mūtra karanteṇa dhāra galā bege bahi
baṭaphaḷa bhasilā dekhi narasāiṁ | 8 |
mane bichāra karai rājā driyodhana
ẏeḍe br̥kṣara phaḷa ye ẏeteka sāmānya | 9 |
ẏebe bhāsi yāuacchi kiñchita mata hoi
ẏethi bīja acchi pāñcha sāta śatahiṁ | 10 |
bidhātāra baśe ẏe bījamāne br̥kṣa hebe yebe
samodra prāẏe jaḷa baraṣile ẏe puṇa kicchihiṁ nohibe | 11 |
br̥kṣaku chahiṁlā aṭai keḍe dāru
mane mane bichāri hasilā rājā kuru | 12 |
dhanyak dhanya bidhātā aṭai prabhma paṇa
kāhiṁki kete rūpe karichu nibongāṇa | 13 |
br̥kṣamānaṅkara rājā yebaṇa sthābara
tā bija bhāsilā mūtrare mohora | 14 |
taḷaku anāiṁ rājā br̥kṣaku anāiṁ
mane mane bichāriṇa hasilā kurusāiṁ | 15 |
yahuṁ se hasilā gāndhāri nandana
dāsīhim hasilā hoi hr̥ṣṭa mana | 16 |
kope driyodhana boilā mudusulīki |
kimarthe hasilu kebaṇa kathā dekhi | 17 |
sarūpa kari kaha lo ẏe tora kebaṇa prakr̥ti
upahāsa kalu ki anamite hasilu nibr̥ti | 18 |
mudusulī boilā śuṇimā gosāiṁ
tumbhe yahiṁki hasila muhiṁ hasili tahiṁ pāiṁ | 19 |
rājana boilā muṁ ki nimante hasili kaha
na kahile tu āja nāśa galu ta niścaẏa | 20 |
mudusulī boilā śuṇimā gosāiṁ
kāli prabhāte debārccane jaṇāibi muhiṁ | 21 |
nr̥pati boile kāli yebe mote na kahibu sata
nāsā śrabaṇa dui karibi tora hata | 22 |
āgyāṁ dei rājana galā nija pura
ẏethu anantare śuṇa bilaṅka nr̥pabara | 23 |
kaṇṭa kari mudusulī galāka bhitara
mane bichārai maraṇa hoilā mohora | 24 |
na jāṇi hasili muṁ ki kahibi kāli prabhāte
bho dharma debatā pratikāra kara mote | 25 |
āja dina bañchāili baḷa buddhi kari
kāli nr̥pati daṇḍiba muṁ ki rūpe hoibi pāri | 26 |
yeuṁ dinuṁ gāndhāra bongśa bandī kari
pathara ghara bhitare bharilā daṇḍadhārī | 27 |
anna jaḷa yāhā diai māna catrabratī
bandī ghara bhitare dāsī prabeśa karāẏe niti | 28 |
se dina anna gheni manara birase
prabeśa helā yāiṁ bandī mandira pāśe | 29 |
guṇḍuri jaḷā bāṭe ḍākilā thira kari
ke acha anna babu nia bega kari | 30 |
bihi tumbhaṅku mote kalāka antara
lāli nāsā śrabaṇa mo chediba nr̥pabara | 31 |
bhitare thāiṇa śaṅkuni kahai bacana
ki doṣe nāśa tote kariba rājana | 32 |
dāsī boilā deba na jāṇai kicchi
prakr̥ti saṅskāre kāli gāndhārīra batsi | 33 |
baṭa br̥kṣa mūḷe bijaẏa kalā āsi
mūtra nīra bahante manda manda hasi | 34 |
taḷaku chāhiṁṇa se netraku bujilā
br̥kṣaku nirekhi se puṇi hiṁ hasilā | 35 |
rājā hasi uṭhante hasilaiṁ muhiṁ
śuṇi rājana boilā lo hasilu kāhiṁ pāiṁ | 36 |
karayoḍi boili muṁ na jāṇai kicchi
tumbhe yahiṁki hasila muṁ tahiṁki hasili kurubatsi | 37 |
rājā kahilā tu kaha mora manara bāratā
nohile prāṇe tote maribi sarbathā | 38 |
ẏemante boli āgyāṁ deichanti daṇḍadhārī
kāli prabhātere ye pakāiba māri | 39 |
śaṅkuni boilā māgo na kara mane cintā
āmbhe kahibā rājāra antargata bāratā | 40 |
yemante rājana tote na boliba kicchi
ẏemante āśrija upāẏa āmbha tahiṁ acchi | 41 |
yetebeḷe rājana tote pucchiba bārata
bolibu śuṇa prabhma kurukuḷanātha | 42 |
baṭa mūḷe yetebeḷe kalu ye prakr̥ti
baṭa bīja upuciāi mūtrara sohati | 43 |
bījaku anāi br̥kṣaku anāi
bidhātā sumari hasilu kurusāiṁ | 44 |
śaṅkuni tahuṁ tathya bichāra pāi dāsī
rājāra chāmure miḷilā prasanna hoi āsi | 45 |
prabhātuṁ uṭhi dāsīki pucchilā daṇḍadhārī
sundarī kahai bhaẏaku dūra kari | 46 |
baṭamūḷe bijaẏe ye kalu daṇḍadhara
ratnajharīre muṁ ye dharithili nīra | 47 |
mutrare tumbhara baṭa mañji ye bhāsante
br̥kṣaku chāhiṁ taḷaku chāhiṁ hasilu kurunāthe | 48 |
antargata bāratā kahilā dāsī yahuṁ
śuṇiṇa āśrija helā kurukuḷaprahu | 49 |
dāsīki anāi daṇḍe mauna hoi rahi
mane mane antargate bhāḷilā kurusāiṁ | 50 |
dāsī chāraka nuheṁ ẏehāra ẏe buddhi
bhūta bhabiṣya arttamāna tini kāḷe siddhi | 51 |
ẏemanta jana niśceṁ kahilā ẏehāre
dāsīki chāhiṁṇa kahilā kurubīre | 52 |
tohora carita ẏe nohai kadācita
kaha tote kahilā kebaṇa paṇḍita | 53 |
dhanaratna bahuta aḷaṅkāra debi
yābata hoṣa tohora kṣamā muṁ karibi | 54 |
dāsī boilā āho śuṇimā kurunātha
pratidina yāhāku muṁ diai nīra bhāta | 55 |
pathara ghare yāhāku rakhichu nr̥pabara
se kahilā tora ẏe hr̥daẏa bichāra | 56 |
śuṇiṇa rājana bahuta haraṣa hoilā
bahuta dhanaratne tahuṁ dāsīki maṇḍilā | 37 |
āstāna jagatīre ẏekānte bichārile basi
ẏehi se upāẏe śatr̥ku pāribaiṁ nāśi | 58 |
bhuta bhabiṣya barttamāna jāṇai tini kathā
ẏehi se mantrī paṇaku-sabhāre yogyatā | 59 |
sakaḷa sabhājana gheniṇa narapati
tera māse bije kalāka kurupati | 60 |
kabāṭa pheḍāilā yāiṁ māna catrabratī | 61 |
hākai driyodhana dvāre ubhā hoi
jībantā ke acchi bli ḍākai kirusāiṁ | 63 |
anna khinne śaṅkuni kahai trodha bāṇī
anamite mora bongśa tu nāśilu nr̥pamaṇi | 64 |
śaẏe chaẏāṇoi jaṇa māilu mohora ho rāẏe
nillaja ātmā mora braticchi ẏekāẏe | 65 |
ẏehāṅkara abastā dekhi śarīra kimpā na yāu
dhika mohora jībana gridhinī māṁsa khāu | 66 |
karmaku nindi trodha karai śaṅkuni
hr̥daẏe baikuly rājāra trodha māni | 67 |
āgyāṁ dilā se dhuśāsana durjaẏaku
bhitare paśi āṇa re mohora chāmuku | 68 |
āgyā pramāṇe se paśile bhitare
śaṅkuni ki koḷa kari āṇnti beni bare | 69 |
bhitaru bāhāra se hoilā śaṅkani
driyodhana boilā māmu jībana tohora dhani | 70 |
kaneka ratna ghaṭe pāṇi ye puroi
snāhāna karāilā āpaṇe snnidhye ubhā hoi | 71 |
aneka sugandha ye lagāi tāhāra keśe
srāhāna karāi pindhāile jhīna bāse | 72 |
aneka kusumeṇa keśa sāñjoi
aṣṭa ratna aḷaṅkāra śarīre ābharaṇa karāi | 73 |
candana catusama mr̥galābha kasturī
āpaṇe driyodhana śaṅkuni śarīre lepana kari | 74 |
śrīhaste pāṭa śāṛhī dilāka kurupti
ẏe pañchu kaṭake mātuḷa tumbe ẏekāṅka mahāmantrī | 75 |
ye se nāśa gale tora pitā bāndheba sohodare
tāhā mātra tote dei na pāribi mantrībare | 76 |
indra praśasta yama praśasta hastinā jaẏantā bāruṇā
ẏe pañchu rājyaku māmu tuhi se dhāraṇā | 77 |
baiṭhā rājā se ājahuṁ mohora
tohora āgyāṁhi se pañchu rājyaku nirādhāra | 78 |
ālamba paṭachatra ubhāranti benipākhe
chāmure phurai subarṇṇa bandhā śaṅkha lakṣe | 79 |
lakṣeka ālata ye ṛhāḷanti beni kati
bāma ḍāhāṇe ubhārile daśa lakṣa rathī | 80 |
āgeṇa mahāmatta ye pān1cha lakṣa gaja
pachareṇa pāñcha marbhmata aśva chekhāra kale saja | 81 |
ẏesaneka sampada karāiṇa śaṅkuni
gāndhārīṅka chāmuku driyodhana galā gheni | 82 |

div.note: lakṣeka chāmara ye paḍai beni kati

lg.l: sagjaẏe kahile śuṇa ho gāndharasena ra dohita
śaṅkuni nāmeṇa ye bratilā tohora ẏeka bhrātha | 83 |
aneka puruṣārtha ye karāilā driyodhana
dutī indra prāẏe diśai gāndhārasenanāna | 84 |
gāndhārī boile ẏe sabhiẏeṁ gale nāśa
ẏekā pāmara tu jībane kalu āśa | 85 |
muhiṁ ẏebe tohora re prakr̥ti jāṇili
tu ẏekā bratilu driyodhanara bongśa nāśa karibu boli | 86 |
mohora bacana śuṇa re kuru-rāja-deba
śaṅkuni bacanaku bābu re na yibu sadabhāba | 87 |
yāhara bongśa nāśa kalu tāhāku kalu mantrī
ubhaẏe kuḷa na pāibi boli boile mahāsatī | 88 |
pitā kuḷa, svāmī kuḷa abaśya yiba nāśa
yahiṁ pāpa tahiṁ nāśa hoanti abaśya | 89 |
gāndhārī kahile siddha artha bāṇī
murkha driyodhana tāha śabaṇe na śuṇi | 90 |
rāgeṇa gāndharasena ku rāẏe māri
pāṇḍabaṅka rāge ho apāra bisari | 91 |
karṇṇa śaṅkuni ye aśastamā kr̥pa
ẏehānta gheni ẏekānte bhāḷuthāi nr̥pa | 92 |
bidure kahile ye yujheṣthiṅka agrate
dhr̥tirāṣṭi bābu re aneka kopa kalā tote | 93 |
tu bābu ẏe kathanta bujhithaa parimāṇi
aneka pramāda tote cintiba kurumaṇi | 94 |

div.note: niścaẏe chāḍili muhiṁ dui kuḷara āśa
mātr̥ pitr̥ kuḷa nāśa yiba ye abaśya |

lg.l: rājā gāndhārasena bongśa nāśa kalā tumbha rāge
śaṅkuni mahāmantrī hoilā śubha yoge | 95 |
abaśya pramāda se cintibaṭi tumbhaṅku
bahuta bāge sambhāḷi thibaṭi bhīmasenaku | 96 |
yujheṣṭhi pachāranti bidura agrate
dhr̥tirāṣṭi ẏete rāga karicchi kinā mote | 97 |
yadyapi adaẏā mote karibe kururāẏe
tuhi mātra tāta mote karithāa sadaẏe | 98 |
bidura bāsudebe yebe hoibe sapakṣa
trailokya brahmāṇḍe mote ke acchi samakakṣa | 99–5830 |

div.head: {@jatu gr̥ha nirmāṇa o bhīmara biṣa laḍu bhakṣaṇa@}

lg.l: badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu
kūṭa upāẏe pāñchu acchi dhr̥tarāṣṭara tanu | 1 |
driyodhana karṇṇa śaṅkani aśastamā
bāruṇābante basi bhāḷanti mahātamā | 2 |

div.note: nije kṣibra na chāḍai driyodhana manu

“badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu” pāṭha pare duigoṭi
pothire adhikā pāṭha–
bho pitā kemante ẏethuṁ pāra hoibu boilā |

lg.l: tuḷamāsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa dvitīẏāra tithi
banaste thāi bhāḷai māna catra bratī | 3 |
āho purocana nāme ẏekai dvijabara
ẏeka hoithāi brāhmaṇa banasta bhitara | 4 |
pūbong abhiśāparu aṣṭabasuru ẏeka basu
śāpa anumatuṁ ẏe bulai bana kandara deśu | 5 |

div.note: driyodhana rājāku śūnya puruṣa hari nelā |
are arjjuna tu sādhya kara bhale |
nohile muhiṁ maribiṭi tohora ye āge
na maraiṁ boli bāsudebaṅka rāṇa kahili muhiṁ ẏebe |
bāṭa na pāiṇa se citrasena gandhabong
ratha na caḷilā se rahilā śūnya ṭhāba |
bolai gandhabong sy kalaiṁ bhala kr̥ta
ẏe hetu na bichuri mote patha nirodhanā kari |
dekhibā pāṇḍabaṅkara baḷa śauryya ye mati |
ẏete bichāri gandhabong pakai delā bhūmigata
śare sāgara kari banddha āṇilā bīra pātha |
driyodhanaku se ye kopeṇa chāḍi dilā
ratha rakha arjuna boli driyodhana śr̥nyare ḍāka dilā |
śare śare niśāṇi kari taḷāi āṇilā
tuḷā paṭa prāẏe āsi nabare paḍilā |

lg.l: pr̥bong anukarmare ẏe bana pabonge achanti basi
purocana paṇḍāẏe snnaidhye hoileka āsi | 6 |
dhārmika bibeka beda śāhāsreṇa nirjitā
beda ādhyāna se karai brāhmaṇa mhatā| 7 |
karnṇa pachārile tumbhe kāhiṁra paṇḍā he
banaste bhramuacha hoiṇa nirbhaẏe | 8 |
byāghra bhālukeṇa tumbhe na kara ki śaṅkā
ẏe ghora banaste tumbhe bula kiṁpe ẏekā | 9 |
purocana boilā tumbhe kāhiṁra narapati
hata rājya prāẏe tumbhra bhāḷuṇi ye mati | 10 |
karṇṇa boile tumbhe śuṇa ho dvijabara
pañchukaṭake ādhipati ẏe driyodhana mahābīra | 11 |
ẏehāra baḍa kaṣṭa śatr̥ra upadarpe
aneka bisarai rājā bairi matta gabonge | 12 |

div.note: boilā ki bara mukui debu maāgibi tote
tohora anarghya mukuṭa yebe debu mote |
āpaṇā śatr̥ku para māruthile tahiṁki kale trodha |
re re kāra bacana kari trodha ye karai |
sehi śarīra gheni se svargaku caḷi yibe |
śuṇa he sugyaṁ jana yujheṣṭhiṅkara mahimā
śatu marante naśa karāi āpaṇā nija ātmā |
āho droyodhana mūḷe duṣṭe pabongte chanti basi |

lg.l: bicakṣaṇa bibeka dharmaka mahārāẏe
keḍeka śatr̥ se tāhāku tohora ẏeteka bhaẏe | 13 |
ratha gaja aśva pādānti baḷa tāra kete
sabong māā rāṇḍa pañcha goṭi putre | 14 |
purocana boilā ẏeteka chāraku
beḍhiṇa māri ki ho ha pārila tāhaṅku | 15 |
driyodhana boilā tāṅku prakarme nohu sari
yuddheṇa baḷabantā prākarme keśarī | 16 |
purocana boila mohora acchi ni upāẏe
muhiṁ tāhā nāśa kari pārai kururaẏe | 17 |
ẏemanta śatr̥ se tumbhara tāhāku ẏeḍe bhaẏe
yāhā kahibi muṁ karivba kathāẏe | 18 |
grāma goṭiẏe mātrakatu tāhāṅku chāḍibu
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa mote debu | 19 |
jadura ghareka muṁ bhiāibi kūṭe
jau sajlāsa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭe | 20 |
āho pāṇḍabanta ruhāibu se gharare āṇi
nidrā kāḷeṇa jāli debaiṁ muhiṁ ẏe raẏeṇī | 21 |
jadura ghare dahana hoibe pañchu bīre
ẏekāṅga rājā tu hoibu pañchu kaṭakare | 22 |
śuṇiṇa parama sananda hoilā kurupati
brāhmaṇakaiṁ sambhaḷilā aneka kari prīti | 23 |
boilā ẏehi bāruṇābanta kaṭaka ye mohora rajya
tohora āgyāṁẏe ẏehā chāḍili ho dvija | 24 |
aneka ratna dei se kalāka gauroba
ātmāhuṁ adhika se hoilā priẏa bhāba | 25 |
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa
ẏe chāriṅki marddi purekanirmita kalā kūṭa ye kapaṭa | 26 |
bicitra lekhana upare nibongāṇi
lambanti aṣṭa ratne mukutā jharāmaṇī | 27 |
kāntha chāḷa se rua batā ādi kari
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭe jaḍi | 28 |
bhitareṇa samāna upare bicitra kama
jhalakanti maṇi ratna cirāḷa uttama | 29 |
subarṇṇara kaḷasa ye basāi upare
pura nibongāṇa kalā brāhmaṇa pāñcha baraṣare | 30 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki hakāri ye boile dhr̥tarāṣṭe
bābu tohora thibā na yogāi hāstinā kaṭake | 31 |
bābu bhīmasena driyodhana hoile aneka aprīti
dvanda hoiba bābu na raha tu ẏethi | 32 |
tumbhanta chāḍilu kaṭaka bāruṇābante
sukheṇa rājya bhoga kara pañchu bhrāthe | 33 |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhe ādyahuṁ banacara
janmahuṁ baḍhilu āmbhe śaaśiṁga pabongtara | 34 |
ẏe tohora āgyāṁ ye śire dhari mānu āmbhe pañchu bhrāthe
bāruṇābanta rāije tāta rahibu niścinte | 35 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭara āgyāṁ śire nirādhāra kari
śubha anakūḷa yoga lagna ye bichāri | 36 |
mārgaśīra kr̥ṣṇapakṣa pratipadā candrabāra
br̥ṣarāśiku bhoga ye aṭai se dinara | 37 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa śiba nāme yoga
tāra candra baḷa śaśī rohiṇī ghare bhoga | 38 |
ẏesaneka śuddha śubha yoga anakūḷe
bāruṇābantaku anakūḷa kale śubhalagna beḷe | 39 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba
kointāṅku gheni caḷile pañchu ye pāṇḍaba | 40 |
prabeśa yujheṣṭhi yāi bāruṇābanta praśaste
jadura ghara dvāre ye rahile pañchu bhrāthe | 41 |
dekhanti bhmabana ye ati parimaḷa
subarṇṇa kaḷasa ye basai ḍhaḷahaḷa | 42 |
cauṁrī nabara bistāra bhiāṇa sātapura
khañjita ratna maṇi māṇikya bistāra | 43 |
subarṇṇara pātiā ye upare chāẏeṇī
marakata baiḍuryya gajadanta śuddhamaṇi | 44 |
pīḍhāra upareṇa māṇikya puñji puñji
bāḷa ādityara teja prabhāteṇa gañji | 45 |
pīḍhāra upareṇa nibongāṇa ye aṣṭaratna kama
dekhiṇa aneka uṣata ye hoile bīra bhīma | 46 |
bhīmasena boile ẏe baḍa susañcha bhmabana goṭi
bārasvatī bhmabana jāṇi teja ẏehāra phuṭi | 47 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu bhitareṇa paśa
kemanta sarūpa tāhā tu bichāriṇa āsa | 48 |
yujheṣṭhiṅka ākhyāṁa pramāṇe māruti
jadura ghara bhitare paśilā tatakṣaṇānti | 49 |
kaṇaẏa patra rasaṇi aneka ratna khañji
ki abā bārānidhi gheni lakṣmī ẏethi bhaji | 50 |
bhīmasena boila svāmī śuṇa rājadeba
ẏeḍe daẏā kiṁpe kalā mānagobinda keuṁṇa prastāba | 51 |
ẏe madhya svargareṇa ẏemanta dekhilā mora nāhiṁ
muhiṁ āśrija hoili ẏe purakaiṁ chāhiṁ | 52 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa puaṅku mora aneka rāga thilā
ẏe dibya bhmabana dekhante deba samasta pāśora gala | 53 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ye se mūrkha prāṇī
paṇḍita kathā se ye kebeheṁ na śuṇi | 54 |
āpaṇe bije kale jau gharara ghitare
pura parimaḷa jāṇanti pañchu bīre | 55 |
candraśāḷā pure cauṁrī bhmabana
dakṣiṇa jagati ye nānābidha ratna cihna | 56 |
meḍhaka nibongāṇa ye dekhiṇa toṣamati
biśveśvara āsana ki amara bārasvatī | 57 |

div.note: bhitareṇa thāi jau guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa jaḍi

lg.l: upare subarṇṇa rasāṇa patra aṣṭārante khañjaṇi kari | 58 |
dekhanti susañcha ye atyanta amūlya
kubera aḷakā bhmabana ye nohai samatula | 59 |
pratakṣe parimaḷa se deba bhmabana prāẏe
dekhiṇa parama sānanda se dharmara tanaẏe | 60 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho āmbhe pañchu bhrāthe
āmbhara mātā achanti konta bhojara dohite | 61 |
ẏeheneka pura ye nibongāṇa kalā driyodhana
kāhāra bichāraku ẏehā diśai kesana | 62 |
māẏe boile bābu ẏe baḍa susañcha purī
driyodhana baḍa sadabhābe ẏehā nibongṇa kari | 63 |
tāhāra hr̥de ye āmbhaṅku nāhiṁ pāpa bādhā
mānagobinda ẏe pura karāilā bahiṇa śaradhā | 64 |
lg.note: pura susañcha dekhi bichāranti pañchu bīre |
lg.l: bhīmasena boilā deba ẏe atia susañcha purī
aneka priẏa bhābe ẏehā nibongāṇilā daṇḍadharī | 65 |
ẏebe se jāṇili driyodhanara nikaḷaṅka hiẏā
sodrimā paṇa deba paḷilā kurunāhā | 66 |
arjjuna boilā deba driyodhana aṭai bhala
baḍhilā pīrati deba hoilā samatula | 67 |
sodrimā paṇa deba jāṇimā kemante
bhala bāñcchā karai deba tāhāra hr̥dagate | 68 |
abhābaku bhāra yebe karanti yebaṇa prāṇī
sujana saṅgatare tāhāntaiṁ gaṇi | 69 |
sodara sodrimā paṇa jānimā kemante
dhana prāṇa bhāriyā bhābai hr̥dagate | 70 |
nakuḷa boilā de ba tāta nikaḷaṅka hiẏā
teṇu se driyodhana āmbhaṅku dilā ẏehā | 71 |
se mahā dhārmaka bibeka sodrima
ambhanta sambhāḷilā aṭai tāra dharma | 72 |
sahadeba boilā deba baḍa susañcha pura
ati ananta alekha se kaṇaẏa bistāra | 73 |
driyodhana āmbhaṅku kāhiṁ ẏeḍeka suhr̥de
kapaṭa prāẏe deba bujhai mohora hr̥de | 74 |
yujheṣṭhi koḷa ye kale sahadebaṅku
tohora prasāde bābu kāraṇa achai muku | 75 |
sahadebaṅku gheni ẏekānta hoile yujheṣṭhi deba
bābu kemanta kapaṭa re kahasi sahadeba | 76 |
lg.note: ẏeteka sohodre bābu kāraṇa achai muku |
tohora prasāde bābu mukara achai muku |
bābu kemanta gopyāna kathā kahasi sahadeba |
lg.l: sahadeba kahai purocana nāme dvija
tājāra bhiāṇa ẏe aṭai dharmarāja | 77 |
jau sajaḷasa chaṇapaṭa guāghr̥ta bhari
ẏehāra saṅyogeṇa ghara nibongāṇa ye kari | 78 |
kāntha chāḷa rua batā adi kari
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥te jaḍi | 79 |
nidrā kāḷe ẏethi lagāiba jui
ẏemanta bhiāṇa kariacchi kurusāiṁ | 80 |
yujheṣṭhi mane mane sumaranti dharma dharma
bābu gopya kara ni ẏe katha na jāṇu bīra bhīma | 81 |
jāṇile ẏekṣaṇi dvanda ye kariba sāṁgrāma
driyodhana śate bhāiṅki māriba ati tama | 82 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa puanta se sabunti māriba
andharājā goṭi ye anāsta hoiba | 83 |
bābu se abā kapaṭa kala na bichāri
kemante dharme āmbhe hoibā ẏethuṁ pāri | 84 |
sahadeba tūnī hoile yujheṣṭhiṅka bacane
rahile jagabandana bāruṇābanta sthāne | 85 |
trīḍanti bihaḍanti ghora biṭapa bana bhedi
māranti barehā hariṇa bāhuṭiā banacara khedi | 89 |
kutūhoḷe beṇṭe bihaḍanti kuruḷi
yesaneke simgha siṁgha bane nirbhaẏe hoi kheḷi | 87 |
mr̥ga bāhuṭiā gaṇḍā jība māna dhari
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅka katiki yāānti pakṣake draśana kari | 88 |
purocana rāiṇa pachārai driyodhana
pāṇḍabaṅkara mr̥tyuku acchiṭiki bidhāna | 89 |
purocana boilā muṁ gaṅgākūḷīẏā dvija
athabong bedī brāhmaṇa mum samasta bidyāre grāhija | 90 |
ẏuṇisi prakāre ye nāśibā śatr̥ku
tahiṁki adharma kicchi nāhiṁ nā tumbhaṅku | 91 |
biṣa yogāḍeka ẏebe bhiāibi muhiṁ
bhīmāku paraṣibā bhābeṇa bhmañjāi | 92 |
śuṇi kari haraṣa hoilā driyodhana
bega kari ẏehā kara ho brāhmaṇa | 93 |
rāijyaku ruhāibu tohora buddhimate
prathame ẏe kathā ho kara yathā arthe | 94 |
ẏethu ante sañjaẏe bidura bhurisabongā bhīṣma sahita
karṇṇa aśastamā śalya śaṅkuni kr̥pa mānanta | 95 |
ẏehānta basāiṇa se ye bhāḷanti dhr̥tarāṣṭa
rājyakaiṁ ayogya mum naẏana mora bhraṣṭa | 96 |
byase drrbhāsā anurāgeṇa kari
puanta pāili muṁ kṣatriẏa durbhāri | 97 |
pua goṭiẏe abiṣeka karāibi rājyaku
dharma sarūpa bichāri kahiba jāṇa muku | 98 |
bhaẏa uprodha duhiṅki kara tumbhe paritejyā
ẏe pañchu rājyaku ho kehu hoiba mahārājā | 99 |
śuṇiṇa samasta yodhāẏe hoileka tūṣṇī
bhurisabongāẏe boile śuṇa dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 100 |
dharma nimante yebe pachārilu dr̥ḍha kari
na puṇa kopaku tu rāẏe karunā bichāri | 101 |
lg.note: rājyakaiṁ ayogya muṁ naẏana mora bhraṣṭa |
lg.l: dhr̥tarāṣṭa bile kicchihiṁ nāhiṁ kopa
yesaneke bahuta bichāraku āsai sarūpa | 102 |
āho sabunti basāi badaẏanti somabongśī jyeṣṭha bhūrisabongā
āmbhāra bichāraku yogāi yujheṣṭhiṅki rājya debā | 103 |
yāhāra bacanaku bhajai saṅsāra
tāhākai āsai ye yugarte rājya bhāra | 104 |
āmbhanta gheni yebe bhāḷilu kurunātha
āmbhara cichāraku ye yogāi ẏemanta | 105 |
yujheṣṭhi thile tohora driyodhana nohai rājā
yujheṣṭhigki bhajai saṅsāra jana prajā | 106 |
aḷapa doṣe yebe bahuta karai kopa
durbhāra bhāra se jāṇa kisa kariba nr̥pa | 107 |
pratagyāṁ darpe abā driyodhanakaiṁ karibu tu rājā
aneka deśa bhāñjiba ye pajāibe jana prajā | 108 |
jyeṣtha putra thāuṁ kaniṣṭha putra nohai rājya nr̥pa
adacha putra ki se tāhāku bhāñjibu tu tāhāra bāpa | 109 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki rājya dile ẏe ẏeka rājya hoida
nirdvanda hoiṇa subidhane dina yiba | 110 |
tu abā beḷe āmbhara boila bhañjibu dhr̥tarāṣṭa
āpaṇe chatra uḍai basiba sehu pāṭa | 111 |
ẏekā rāije ho duidaṇḍa duidaṇḍa hoile
aneka dvanda hoiba dina na yibaṭi bhale | 112 |
lg.note: durbhāra apaḷaka se aṭe kisa nr̥pa |
lg.l: tote se rāija pada dile śāẏeṁtanura tanu
baḷe tora rājya ghenilāṭi kāḷa ye damantau | 113 |
paḷāi paśilu yai tu śataśiṁga pabongte
māḍiṇa basilā rājya damana pañchai praśaste | 114 |
paṇḍu ye se beḷe tapasyāẏe hoithile agiẏāna
rājya sukhe bhega kalā kāḷa ye damana | 115 |
pañchadana baraṣa yahuṁ paṇḍura sagpūrṇṇa hoilā
bhāgyabara toṣi aneka bidya sādhya kalā | 116 |
kāḷadamanara tule aneka ghora yuddha
paṇḍu tāhāṅku jiṇilā tetiśa dinara madhya | 117 |
caubiṁśa kṣeuṇi ye damanara thāṭha
paṇḍura śara ghāte se hoile muṇḍa kāṭa | 118 |
pañcha puruṣa gheni se rājye basithilā
paṇḍura bighāte tāra bongśa nāśa galā | 119 |
tote basāilā āṇi hastinā bhmabane
tote saṅpada deiṇa se paśilā ghora bane | 120 |
paṇḍura arjilāra ẏe aṭai pañchu rājyai
tāhāra putrakaiṁ se saṅsāra yogāi | 121 |
tu abā ẏe kathā ho rājā karibu gupata
se jāṇi achanti ye samasta tadanta | 122 |
lg.note: paṇḍu se beḷare tape hoithile magna
lg.l: pañchadaśa baraṣare huante tapa pūrṇṇa |
kāḷadamanara tule gora yuddha kalā |
lg.note: paṇḍurājā jāṇai ye śabada bhedī bāṇa
paṇḍara putraku sagsara jana ye bhajai |
lg.l: yujheṣṭhi thile tote rājyabhāra nāhiṁ
ẏethi madhye yujheṣṭhiṅki samārji pāra yebe dharma kathā kahi | 123|
bidure boile yujheṣṭhi hoibe yebe śānti
bhīma arjjuna kiṁpe bhajibe triputi | 124 |
śaṅkuni boilā mora kathāẏe achai
paṇḍura pañchu putraku yebe niśeṣa kari māraiṁ | 125 |
tebe se driyodhana ẏe rājye heba rājā
sukhe bhogya kariba rājya jana prājā | 126 |
dharma dharma sumari samaste sabhāru gale uṭhi
pāṇḍabanata māribāku buddhiẏe karai dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 127 |
kūṭa kapaṭa bhiāuachanti śaṅkuni purocana
karṇṇa dhuśāsana śate bhāi driyodhana | 128 |
biṣa laḍura yogāḍa ye bhiānti mane bhaḷi
dharma teyā kale ye asatya pratipāḷi | 129 |
maneṇa bichāranti se dhr̥tarāṣṭa rāẏe
kebaṇa buddhi ẏebe karibā upāye | 130 |
ẏethu antare se paṇḍura kamare
bhramanti mr̥gaẏā binode pañchu bīre | 131 |
gaṇḍā goṭiẏe māileka gora bane
yujheṣṭhi boile re śūna bhīmasene | 132 |
apūbong padārtha ẏe nia hastināku
gaṇḍā goṭi nei dei āsa dhr̥tarāṣṭa rājāṅku | 133 |
yujheṣṭhiṅkara bacane se pabanara śiṣi
gaṇḍā goṭi gheni se hastināku āsi | 134 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa saṅjaẏe bidura kr̥pa aśastamā
ẏehānta gheni bhāḷai kṣatriẏa mahātamā | 135 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile na bhāñja tumbhe mote
tretaẏā yuge kemante kale daśarathe | 136 |
śrīrāmacandra ye aṭanti jyeṣṭha putra
tāhāṅku chāḍi rājya dilāka bharatha | 137 |
bidure boile se khaḷa bacane ẏemanta kalā
bhratha rājā nohilā āpaṇe nāśa galā | 138 |
bidure boile tu na bhāḷa ni ẏemāna
mandabuddhi bhāḷiṇa puanta karuchu anyoanya | 139 |
āpaṇe kaṣṭi hoi maribu bongśahiṁ nāśa yiba
tohora buddhibaḷe bhrātha ẏemanta hoiba | 140 |
ẏemanta bhāḷeṇi tahiṁ hoibāra samaẏe
gaṇḍāgoṭi gheni bhīmasena prabeśa āsi hoẏe | 141 |
bidure boile tāta na dhara kiṁpā sīmā
gaṇḍā goṭi gheni draśana kalā bhīmā | 142 |
ẏemanta bhagati tote heuchanti yutre
ẏehāṅku pāpa citta tu dharibu kemante | 143 |
bhagati lokaṅku ye dharai pāpa kathā
āpaṇehiṁ nāśa yāānti pāpe buḍanti sarbathā | 144 |
ẏe kathā māna yebe mithyāṭi hoiba
ẏe saṅsāre jana āu kemante bratiba | 145 |
pūbongra pātakeṇe ẏebe hoilu hīna cachu
ẏe janme puṇi pare pramāda cintuachuṁ | 146 |
ẏemanta pātaka kale uparaku nāhiṁ ta sadagati
narka hiṁ se acchiṭi tote nāśakara śāsti | 147 |
bidura bacane andha uṭhilā śira jhuṇi
khaṇḍā ẏeka gheni āsai biduraku hāṇi | 148 |
koḷa kari dhaile se aśastamā kr̥pe
raha raha nr̥pati kiṁpe ẏeḍeka paritāpe | 149 |
uṭhiṇa bidura ye galeka nija sthāne
bile bongśa nāśa kalu tohora manda gyāne | 150 |
bhīmasenaku koḷ kari dhaile nikaṭe
mukhe cumbana dei badaẏanti dhr̥tarāṣṭe | 151 |
bābu tu yāi kahibu yujheṣṭhiṅka āgara
sodare anyoanya karāucchi bidura | 152 |
tāhāra bacanaku kehi na yibaṭi biśvāsa
nārakhāra bhiāi se sabunti karibaṭi nāśa | 153 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile driyodhanaku rāi
bhīmasenaku gheni bhmañjibasa sabu bhāi | 154 |
pitāra bacane driyodhana bhīmaku koḷa kari
sarobare paśi snāhāna bege sāri | 155 |
ṭhāba sajāḍiṇa rāile purocana
bhīmāku pāśe gheni basile driyodhana | 156 |
ḍāhāṇe driyodhana bāme dhuśāsana
madhyare basāile ye pabana nandana | 157 |
ratnajharire dileka subāsita pāṇi
subarṇṇa pailama ye chāmure dile āṇi | 158 |
paraśai anna ye bipra subarṇṇa pātra gheni
cintu acchi pramāda se bipra ye agyānī | 159 |
bhojane atriputi se pabanara baḷā
bhmañjai brikodara se āhāre mati bhoḷā | 160 |
dudutrā mañji gañjāi śākara miśāi bhari
māchare miśāilā tāhā rānddhalā yatna kari | 161 |
upare bhala thilā tāhā driyodhanaku dilā
taḷe jaḍi biṣamāna tāhā bhīmasenaku paraśilā | 162 |
madhura suādare tāhā bmañjai māruti
jāiphaḷa garaḷa miśāi delā khaṇḍa paṇā kati | 163 |
lg.note: kṣīra khāra miśāi se sabunti karibaṭi nāśa |
lg.l: driyodhana boilā mote śoṣa nāhiṁ
bhīmasena katiki se dilāka baḍhāi | 164 |
sukheṇa piai se pāṇḍaba sundara
duguṇa ghārilā biṣa madhura āhāra | 165 |
adhāma bhitare lailā acchi mahurā siṁghaḍā jāti
tuhuṁ kaporāẏe dilā se bhīmasena kati | 166 |
khaṇḍa śākara ye medilā acchi tahiṁ
bhmañjai brikodara maneṇa haraṣa pāiṁ | 167 |
bhojana ante nei paraśile biṣa laḍu
ahribrateka laḍu tā grāsa baḍhu | 168 |
laḍura susvāda ye ati upamā dekhi
goṭāẏe goṭāẏe kari bhmañjai naẏana nirekhi | 169 |
gañjāi phaḷa dudurā phaḷara kākarā
ābara miśrita tahiṁ siṁghaḍā jāti mahurā | 170 |
kāḷasarpara biṣa laḍure se bhari
ẏehāku bhakṣiṇa brikodara prāṇa hāri | 171 |
lāgilā biṣa ye paḍilā acete
madhura rasa pāi se biṣa khepilā nija gātre | 172 |
bhmañju bhmañjuṇa ḍhaḷi paḍilā bīra bhīma
sehiṭhāre loṭi se hoilā asāṣṭama | 173 |
thanamāna niścaḷa na bahai pabana
chāḍilā pañchabhūta hoilā acebana | 174 |
āditya asta yahuṁ gale paścima diga bhāge
rātra adha āsi ye hoilā niśā yoge | 175 |
dhuśāsana durjaẏe durbinda durāṣṭa
bhīmaku dharinei pakaile jaḷa ghāṭa | 176 |
lg.note: tahuṁ catarāẏe dilā se bhīmasena kati |
lg.l: yamunā nadīre ye thāānti nāgeṇī
bhīmasenaku bānddhanei melikle tahiṁ pāṇi | 177 |
ẏehi jaḷa madhye nāguṇī ẏāklu khāu
kurubīra mānaṅkara āpada ājhuṁ yāu | 178 |
ẏete boli chāriheṁ aile pakāi
bhīmakaiṁ māri svastha hoile kurusāiṁ | 179 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏenti agasti
dharma thilā prāṇīki na āse pāpa kati | 180 |
ananta nāgara duhitā belābāḷī
padmeka nāgeṇī gheni se karai jaḷakeḷi | 181 |
nāgeṇī baḷa gheniṇa se kheḍa kheḍanti jaḷe
padma biṅghasita ye śiśira rutu kāḷe | 182 |
nāgeṇī bichāranti ẏeta baḍāi apūbong
śiśire sulabha ta basanta pallaba | 183 |
kāli ta kicchihiṁ na thilā ẏehu jaḷe
adabhmate hoi bighasiṁta kamaḷe | 184 |
dekhanti goṭāẏe kisa apuruba
loḍante dekhile se sundara mr̥tu śaba | 185 |
ati sukumāra susañcha tāhāra kāẏe
rātrakāḷe diśai śarada candramāra prāẏe | 186 |
dekhiṇa koḷa kari dhailā belābāḷī
ẏe purukṣa aṭai mo manara hiāḷi | 187 |
koḷa kari nageṇī ye buḍāile tāhāku
gheni gale sundarī se pātāḷa bhmabanaku | 188 |
chāmure nei dile ananta nāgarājā
bichārai ananta kebaṇa digapāḷa ātmajā | 189 |
amr̥ta dilā āṇi brikodara mukhe
naba śasra nāgara baḷa hoi uṭhilā pratakṣe | 190 |
sāṣṭama hoi bīra chāhaiṁ caukati
dekhai jaḷabhmabana pūri achai apramiti | 191 |
caukatiki chāhiṁ manare bichāri
muhiṁ ta paḍili āsi jaḷa bhmabana andhāra purī | 192 |
ke mote āṇi ẏethe kalāka kapaṭe
agāda jaḷa bhmabana ẏethuṁ mu yibi kebaṇa ghāṭe | 193 |
ẏe nāgeṇī baḷamānaṅku pakāibi māri
yibākaiṁ bāṭa nāhiṁ ẏe jaḷa andhārapurī | 194 |
puṇi bichārai ẏehāṅkara tule hoibi pīrati
bhāba baḍhāile mote se achai sadagati | 195 |
bhīmasena boilā tumbhe śuṇa go nāgeṇī
muhim ye mānuṣa kehu mote ẏethaku āṇi | 196 |
bhīmasenara bacane se ananta dulāḷī
bhīmaku koḷa kariṇa se boilā belābāḷī | 197 |
ananta nāga duhitā āmbhe jaḷabhmabana bāsī
sandhyābāḷī belābāḷī bijhaṁbāḷī udāsī | 198 |
ẏe chāri kanyāẏe āmbhe ananta dulāḷī
yamunā jaḷa gabhīra yojana sahasra ye chāri | 199 |
trīḍā raṅga karante bheṭilu tuku yāiṁ
mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭi ye tu thilu upuciāiṁ | 200 |
driyodhana tote ye bhmañjāiṇa nela
kapata kūṭa kariṇa se tote biṣalaḍu dilā | 201 |
lubudhe khāiṇa tu paḍilu acebane
agāda jaḷe tote pakāile kurubīramāne | 202 |
āmbhe bheṭilu tote trīḍāraṅga beḷe
ananta nāga chāmuku tote āṇilu pātāḷe | 203 |
amr̥ta deiṁṇa tote jiāiṁle āmbha tāta
tu ẏebe māriṇa loḍuachu ye āmbhanta | 204 |
paraku upagāra kale ki āpaṇe nāśa yibā
leñcha lokaṅku ho upagāra na karibā | 205 |
nāgeṇīra bacane bhīmasena parama śanti
chāḍilā kopabhara batāilā pīrati | 206 |
pabanara nandana dekhi sānanda pañchu mane | 207 |
bābu tu ye somabongśī aṭu mahābaḷī
mohora dohitā tote pradāna karibi belābāḷī | 208 |
bolai māruti tora yehneka bichārai
mohora beḷe ki tāhā nāsti kari pārai | 209 |
yācilāra kanyā ye yāclāra anna
ẏehā upekṣile nāśa yāi dharma | 210 |
amr̥ta yoge se sīukāra kari nāgarāẏe
belābāḷī kanyaku bhīmasenaku pradāna kaẏe | 211 |
nāgeṇī pradāna kari se ananta nāgarājā
aneka sambhare bhīmasenaku kalā pūjā | 212 |
puruṣa baśa bidyā se jāṇai nageṇī
bhābe baśya hoilā se kāḷadaṇḍa pāṇi | 213 |
ananta boilā mu apūbong debaiṁ kisa
yautuka dilā amr̥ta kumbha biśeṣa | 214 |

div.note: dekhiṇa santoṣa hoilu tote bhagati kutūhoḷe |
amr̥ta naba kuṇḍa se āṇi dilā santoṣe |

lg.l: bichārai bhīmasena ẏehā kāhiṁ thoibi
piṇḍa triputi heba muṁ ẏehā āhāra karibi | 215 |
naba niśvāsake naba kuṇḍa piilā
āhuri naba sahasra nāgara baḷa hoilā | 216 |
ẏeke mahābaḷī pabana tanaẏe
amr̥ta khāi tāra abaḷa baḷa kaẏe | 217 |
pātāḷe rahilā bīra nāgeṇī raṅga rase
pāśorilā sohodranta surati muhāṁse | 218 |
yujheṣṭhi deba pachāranti arjjunaku hakāri
bhīma gaṇḍā ghenigalā hastinā rājya purī | 219 |
naba dibasa hoilā na āsilā ājaku
kemante bhīmasena mūrcchilā āmbhaṅku | 220 |
kointāẏe boile se driyodhanara meḷa paiṁ
kheḍa kautuke ye achai tahiṁ rahiṁ | 221 |
kointāṅkara bacane se puṇa chaḍa dibasa galā
ṣoḷa dibasa hoila bāratā hohilā | 222 |
yujheṣṭhi arjuna gale bhīmasenaku loḍi
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ hastinā nagra purī | 223 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅka pādataḷe huanti pariṇāmi
bhīma ye ailā, keṇe acchi svāmī | 224 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile se ailā yebaṇa dina
gaṇḍā goṭi deikhalā ẏethe na kalā bhojana | 225 |
takṣaṇe galā se na rahilā ẏetha
śuṇīṇa āśrija hoile dharmasuta | 226 |
driyodhana dhuśāsana śaṅkuni kr̥pa karṇṇaku
jaṇe jaṇe puchā karanti dekhila ki bhīmaku | 227 |
samaste boile āmbhara dekhilā ta nāhiṁ
pañchu kaṭake loḍanti mahā trodha hoi | 228 |
kointāṅkara agrate puchā kale caubhrāthe
bhīmaku loḍi go na pāilu pañchu kaṭai praśaste | 229 |
ẏemante pāṇḍabe hoanti bikaḷa
sabuṅkari naẏanuṁ bahe aśr̥jaḷa | 230 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu
pāṇḍabaṅku manda ẏekā dhr̥tarāṣṭa gyānu | 231 |
śuṇiṇa biṣāda kontabhojara kumārī
keṇe galu dukhīra saṅgāta āmbhaṅku chāḍi kari | 232 |
dharmarājā boile mātā go nohasi biṣāda mane
bhīmasenaku loḍi na pāilu bhībane | 233 |
kointāe boile bana kandara deśe
saṅgata hoi loḍuthiba na jāṇime rākṣase | 234–6064 |

div.note: pada pare mudrita pustakare adhikā pāṭha–
na kahi keṇiki galu āre bhīmasena

lg.l: bhīma bihune maribā āmbhe pañcha prāṇī |
lg.note: śrīkr̥ṣṇa sumari bābu yāa ẏethuṁ jaba |
śrīhari śrīhari smari gale chāri bhāi
lg.head: {@pāṇḍabāsura badha@}
lg.l: āho andhakara bongśe ye pāṇḍabāsura rīra
paṇḍubatīra garbharu ye upujilā brahma asura | 1 |
andhakara putra ye pāṇḍabā mahāsurā
hastinā bhmabanaku se bāhilā mahābīrā | 2 |
thāṭha sanya nāhiṁ se asurara tule
brahmā rudrakaiṁ se jiṇai sāṁgrāme paśile | 3 |
bāmakare śūḷa ḍāhāṇa kare kr̥pāṇai
ẏeteka gheniṇa se sakaḷa bhmabana jiṇai | 4 |
sāṁgrtāme nirbhaẏā se dānaba mahābaḷī
jibharu rudhira dei triputi kalā bhadrakāḷī | 5 |
pasanne bara tāku dile mahādebī
bhagabatī bare se dānaba trījībī | 6 |
se pāṇḍabāsura ye bāhilā bhma bana hastinā
śarīre śahasra nabhedai se aṭai bajrasehnā | 7 |
yeteka jība jantu dekhuacchi pathe yāuṁ
āhāra na aṇṭai yeteka jantu khāuṁ | 8 |
hastinā pāiṇa dhāiṁle se kumāra dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 9 |
raibrata ākhaḍāẏe baḷarāmaṅka tule thile
nidāgha bane se pāṇḍabāsuraku dekhile | 10 |
karṇṇa boilā ẏe ye aṭai asura ari
tapabana bhāñji se ruṣinta nāśa kar | 11 |

div.note: abhaẏa bara tāku dile ye kapāḷī |

lg.l: driyodhana boilā beḍhaṇa dhara ẏehā
māribā niśācara tapodhanaṅka dorehā | 12 |
ẏeteka bichari beḍhile tāhākai kope
narajantu dekhi se uṣata kauṇope | 13 |
kurubīre gadā mūṣaḷanta bulāile toḷi
asura śarīre paḍi gadābara hoilāka dhūḷi | 14 |
gadābara bhāñjante ye hole birase
loci hoi rahile samasta kurubīra nirāśe | 15 |
dekhiṇa pāṇḍabāsura ati garu tāpa
bajra mūṣaḷa gheni se māilā kauṇopa | 16 |
karṇṇa driyodhana dhuśāsana durjaẏe
aśastamā ādi kari paḍile asura śasra ghāẏe | 17 |
dabadeṇa kurubīre paḷāile bikaḷe
sabunti hiṁ goḍāi māilā bajra ye mūsaḷe | 18 |
gāndhārī śate putra ābaa karṇṇa aśastamā
sabunti māilā se asura durātamā | 19 |
sabuṅkari keśa se dhailā loci kari
beni bhmaje toḷi āṇai bāruṇābanta giri | 20 |
boilā daibe yebe dilāka meñjana
ẏe pabongta upare basi karibi bhojana | 21 |
yujheṣṭhi rahi achanti sehi bāruṇābante
bhīmasenaku nadekhi bulanti chāri bhrāthe | 22 |
pabongta upare se mr̥tu piṇḍamāna thoiṁ
nadīre snāhāna ye karai abagāhi | 23 |
yujheṣṭhi dekhile ye dhr̥tarāṣṭara puanta
bhaẏeṇa yujheṣṭhi deba hoile antargata | 24 |

div.note: śalya ādi kari ye ābara kr̥pabrahmā |

lg.l: bhīmaku sumaranti ye deba dharmaśiṣi
bābu anastara natha tu keṇe achu paśi | 25 |
bābu kebaṇa rākṣasa mora bhāinta nāśa kalā
āmbhe ki bratibu ẏeḍe pramāda paḍilā | 26 |
trodhabhare sumarile yahuṁ dharmara nandana
pātāḷe āsana ye kampilā bhīmasena | 27 |
bikai brikodara śuṇa go belābāḷī
mote na dekhi mohora sodare bikaḷī | 28 |
jātaguru ye aṭanti mora nija māta
ātmāguru mora tuhi prāṇara saṅghaāta | 29 |
bhrātā mātāṅku muṁ yāiṁ draśana karibi
puṇa tora tahiṁki go bahana āsibi | 30 |
boilā ye bela bāḷī śuṇa ho prāṇanātha
dekhibu nāhiṁ ki svāmī tohora sodaranta | 31 |
tohora bīryya ye mohora garbhe paḍi
mohora udara ye hoicchi alpa alpa bhāri | 32 |
ẏethaku na puṇa svāmī mane karu bhrānti
napuṇa kāḷe boluṭi tu hoilu asatī | 33 |
bhīmasena boilā go abaśya hoiba dulāḷa
nāma debuti tāhāra tu baḷī ye belaḷa | 34 |
muhiṁ ye mahābaḷī tu aṭu belābāḷī
duhiṁṅkara nāma dei thibuṭi nāgara dulāḷī | 35 |
nāgeṇīki bujhāi se caḷai brikodara
nāgeṇīra māẏāru se ye hoilā bāhāra | 36 |
snāhāna kariṇa se āsai pāṇḍabāsura kauṇopa
mr̥tu piṇḍamānaṅkara se miḷilā samīpa | 37 |

div.note: nāma debuṭi tāhāra tu baḷī ye belāuḷa |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi arjjuna nakuḷa sahadeba
chāri bhāi āsiṇa miḷi ogāḷile dānaba | 38 |
dekhiṇa dānaba se mūṣaḷeka bulāi
pabongta uparaku se āsuacchi dhāim | 39 |
dekhiṇa arjjuna binddhalā hābuḍā nāme śara
dhatikāre paḍilā se dānaba upara | 40 |
rudhira br̥ṣṭi ye hoilā durāpāte | 41 |
puṇi uṭhilā se durbhāra kauṇopa
arjjunaku śūḷe piṭilā garu tāpa | 42 |
arjjuna prahāra kalā bajra ye mudgara
beni śasra hāboḍante kampilā svargapura | 43 |
ẏeheneka sāṁgrāma karante ghora mahāraṇa
bhīmasena prabeśa hoilā tatakṣaṇa | 44 |
dekhiṇa parama sānanda hoile yujheṣṭhi
bābu dhr̥tarāṣṭa puaṅkara dekha re araṣṭi | 45 |
bābu raibrata pabongta ākhaḍāru āsuchanti
pāṇḍabāsura datya ye māilā subunti | 46 |
āhāra karante āmbhe bheṭilu asuraku
aneka yuddha kari jiṇi na pārilu ẏehāku | 47 |
bhīmasena boilā deba kathāku na baḍha
khāu khāu asura kaurobaṅku tumbhe begeṁ chāḍa | 48 |
āpaṇāra bairi deba maruacchi para
ẏehi se parama hita hāde karyyahiṁ apāra | 49 |
gaṇḍā goṭi gheni deba gali yebaṇa dine
bhmañjāi basāile mote driyodhana dhuśāsane | 50 |
lg.note: khāu asura e kairoba baḍha mūḍha |
lg.l: kapaṭa kariṇa achanti ye pāka mahārasa
tahiṁra bhitare lāi mote paraśile biṣa | 51 |
biṣa khāi deba muṁ ḍhaḷīli yetebeḷe
nāgeṇī khāu boli mote meli dile agāda jaḷe | 52 |
svāmī ananta nāgara ye dohitā belabāḷī
nāgeṇī br̥nda gheni se trīḍāraṅga keḷi | 53 |
mote dekhi pātāḷa bhmabanaku gheni gale
mamr̥ta dei mote se jīāiṁle subeḷe | 54 |
ananta rājā mote bibhi dilāka kumārī
aneka bhagati mote hoilā nāgara kumārī | 55 |
āsana kampilā deba tumbhara sumarante
ẏekā niśvāsake aili nāguṇīra mahāmantre | 56 |
bho deba nāśa āmbhe yāhā karantu baibi
daiba nāśilā ẏehāṅku śoka chāḍa daṇḍadhārī | 57 |
chāḍa chāḍa kaurabanta pāṇḍabāsura khāu
yabata kāḷaku āmbhara araṣṭi māna yāu |58 |
yadyapi driyodhana ẏethu prāṇa paiyiba
aneka dukha pāibā deba rājya prāpata nohiba | 59 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu driyodhanakai na kara kopa
deiba daṇḍa bihilā gahiṁra anarūpa | 60 |
āmbhaṅku pāpa citte yāhā cintalā āpaṇe
pratyakṣe dekha bābu phaḷilā ẏehikṣaṇe | 61 |
bābu re aṇaupagārī parahiṁsaka yeuṁ prāṇī
āpaṇe nakale ẏehā daiba bihai ye āṇī | 62 |
lg.note: laḍura bhitare mote bhariṇa dile biṣa |
anya sthāne nohila daṇḍa bihi ta kalā āṇi |
lg.l: dharmahiṁ se chāri yuge bardhuta aṭai re bābu
dharma se sacarācara pāḷana karai sabu | 63 |
dharma thile jighāṁsa nāhiṁṭi prāṇīki
āpada bipada paḍile dharmahiṁ se prāṇīki rakhi | 64 |
bābu anitya saṅsāra ẏe nohai kāhāri
jaḷa bimba phoṭakā prāẏe saṅsāra bihari | 65 |
tu ye adharmare nohu mora bhīma
mr̥tu piṇḍa jīāṁile udita hoi dharma | 66 |
adharma lokaṅku bābu dharama karāuthibā
sehi tamu nāśa yibe āmbhe dharmeṇa uturibā 67 |
bābu dhr̥tarāṣṭa poẏe ye āmbhara sodara
ẏehanta uddhara bhāi dharma upuju tini pura | 68 |
muhiṁ tora āpada ghenai āre bāpa
asuraku badha kara driyodhana chāḍa kopa | 69 |
āmbhara dekhante yebe driyodhana nāśa yiba
andharāja goṭi mora bhāi re anāsta hoiba | 70 |
bābu yadyapi kauroba re maribe ẏe prastābe
muhiṁ ki bratibi driyodhanara abhābe | 71 |
yujheṣṭhiṅkara mukharu kaṣṭhora bacana ye śuṇi
asua uparaku bīra uṭhilā śira jhuṇi | 72 |
brikodaraku dekhiṇa pāṇḍabāsura bege
bajra mūṣaḷa dhari piṭila bhīmasena bāma aṅge | 73 |
paḍiṇa bajra mūṣaḷa cūra hoigalā
asibara gheni kope asura dhāiṁlā | 74 |
khaḍaga prahārante ye dhailā māruti
asura hāthuṁ uchuḍi ghenilāka jhāti | 75 |
se asibara bhīma rurddhabāhu kari hāṇi
paḍiṇa asurara cchiḍilā dakṣiṇa pāṇi | 76 |
puṇi āreka beḷa ye prahāra bhīma kalā
bāma kara pātilā ye cchi ḍiṇa paḍilā | 77 |
puṇi āreka beḷe piṭilā kopānaḷe
tāḷuṭhāru pāda pariyante hoile beni phāḷe | 78 |
pabongeṇa bara tāku deichanti bhadra kāḷarātri
śarīre na kāṭiba tora bajra chela kati | 79 |
tīkṣa asibara śūḷake dile hāthe
ẏe duheṁ hastare thile trailokye kehi jiṇaṇḍa nāhim tote
tohora him śahasra chaḍāi tote ye mārai
tebe se śarīra tohora hoiba apahārai | 81 |
se kāḷīṅkara bacana he nohai āna kalā
tāhāra asibare sehi se nāśa galā | 82 |
namaste surabara sundara śrīrāma
namaste icchāṅkura bongśa maṇḍana guṇa dhāma | 83 |
namaste raghunātha amaḷāṇa sūryyabongśī
namaste śrīrāma kauṇopa baḷa dhvaṁsī | 84 |
namaste śrīrāma kodaṇḍa dīkṣā guru
namaste śrīrāmacandra rābaṇa darpa haru | 85 |
bārānidhi bandhana nātha haribaḷa prāṇabandhu
adhāraṇa puruṣa uddhāraṇa tuhi pabitra pūrṇṇaindu | 86 |
lg.note: “tāḷu ṭhāru pāda pariyante hoile beniphāḷe |” pādānta pare
paḍilā datya ye meru giri jāṇi
lg.l: pūbonge bara tāku deithile gosāmaṇi |
thābara jaṅgama ye kīṭa pataṅga ādi
taba prasāde nātha saburi brata siddhi | 87 |
kauśikara prasanne tāḍakī darpa gañji
janaka ruṣi ghare śibadhanu bhāñji | 88 |
abhaẏā bhmabane ye baikuṇṭhapura bāsī
yāhāra nārāje asura darpa dhaṁsi | 89 |
ananta durgama jaḷa ye kalā ẏeka bāṭa
ahilā svarga pāilā phiṭilā garu kaṣṭa | 90 |
śrī bhagabanta nārāẏaṇa caraṇe śaraṇa
sūryya baṁśika nātha mote karibā uddhāraṇ a| 91 |
yadyapi śrīrāma muṁ dekhanti beni ḍoḷe
snāhāna bhojana muhiṁ tejanti sabongkāḷe | 92 |
abhaẏa padmapāda goṭi pāṣaṇara rekhā
ẏe sagsāra andha paṭaḷaru mote mukati bāṭa dekhā | 93 |
naẏane na dekhi yāhā śabaṇe na śuṇili
gyaṁnaku upalekhi muṁ śabadaku goḍāili | 94 |
śrī jānakī ballabha carane nija dāsa
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsaku baikuṇṭhare debā bāsa | 95–6159 |

div.head: {@jatugr̥ha dāhara mantraṇā@}

lg.l: āho badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho yugabāsī
amr̥ta rasa bhāratha, śarīra yehne toṣi | 1 |

div.note: śūdramuni saroḷā dāsa muṁ kapiḷāsa bāsī |

lg.l: pāṇḍabāsuraku yahuṁ pāṇḍabe badha kale
tahuṁ se pāṇḍaba nāma pāñcheheṁ bahile | 2 |
dhātubāda puruṣa boile śūnyadeba
ājahuṁ tumbha nāma heu ye pañchupāṇḍaba | 3 |
asāṣṭama hoi ye paḍithile kurubīre
śarīra pāile se arjunaru jībanyāsa śare | 4 |
bhīmasena boilā re pratagyāṁ karuthila
japaṭa bhiāi mote biṣalaḍu dela | 5 |
tumbhara nimante re pāṇḍabāsura nāśi
pāṇḍaba nāma āmbhanta dile svargabāsī | 6 |
caḷanti kurubīre aneka abhimāne
bijaẏe kurubīre hastinā bhmabane | 7 |
sañjaẏe kahile śuṇa ambikāra suta
puaṅkara caritra tora śuṇa biparīta | 8 |
baḷarāmaṅkara meḷuṁ āsante tora putre
pāṇḍabāsura dānaba ye dekhilā banaste | 9 |
sāṁgrāma kari sabuntihiṁ māilā mahāroḷe
bhakṣaṇa kariba sabu pakāi anaḷe | 10 |
paṇḍura nandana ye dekhile ẏemanta ra samaẏe
asura māri pratagyāṁ sācha kalā pabana tanaẏe | 11 |
asura māri yahuṁ pratagyāṁ sāchā kale
pañchu pāṇḍaba boli ākāśe ḍākile | 12 |
sañjaẏa kahanteṇa prabeśa driyodhana
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅka agre samasta kahilā karṇṇa | 13 |
śakuni kahilā deba śuṇa kurubai
bhīmasena pāra kalā se biṣalaḍu khāi | 14 |
sañchuẏe to bongśa nāśa heba ho kurubaiṁ
ḥāṇḍabe bratithile tora puaṅkara jībana nahiṁ | 15 |
śuṇiṇa biṣāda hoilā se ambikāra baḷā
agāda samudre niśce mohora buḍilāka bheḷā | 16 |
śaṅkuni boilā tu śuṇa rājyeśvara
pāṇḍabaṅkara nāśa yehne upaẏe deba kara | 17 |
ẏesaneka bichāra ye karai kurunāthe
pāṇḍabe rahichanti bāruṇābanta praśaste | 18 |
bāsudebaṅku sumaranti ẏekānte yujheṣṭhi
yujheṣṭhi sumarante deba miḷīle garuḍāra piṭhi | 19 |
rātra arddhamāne śaṅkuni hakārī bhagabāna
saṅgate ghenichanti sahadeba mantrī puṇa | 20 |
tini jaṇa basi ye bichāra karanti
jadughara tumbhapāiṁ bhiāi acchiṭa urupati | 21 |
sahadeba boile tu mātuḷa śuṇimā
jadura ghara bhiāi achanti kāhāku rakhibe mahātamā | 22 |
gobinde boile tumbhe śuṇa ho beni mantrī
yujheṣṭhiṅki ḍakāi kahibā ẏe ghānti | 23 |
badanti śaṅkuni śuṇimā bāsudeba
dharma sutaṅku deba ki abā kahiba | 24 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki hakāri āṇile niśā bhāge
sakaḷa br̥ttānta ye kahanti tāṅka āge | 25 |
purañchana paṇḍā yadughara bege dahana kariba
bolanti dharma nandana śuṇa bāsudeba | 26 |
ẏe gora saṅkaṭaru tumbhe se rakhiba
tumbhe sāhapakṣa hoithile ke kisaye kariba | 27 |
byāsa bāsudeba bidura mote sapakṣa hoithile
kehu jiṇima mote pr̥thibīre bhale | 28 |

div.note:
śaṅkuni sumarile bhagabāna | purañchana o purocana pāṭha acchi |
“bāsudebaṅku sumaranti” ṭhāru “purocana rāiṇa” paryyanta padamāna keteka
pothire chāḍaacchi –

lg.l: ẏekānte bāsudeba kahile sahadebaṅku
rātreṇa jagāi rakhāiba pura bhīmasenaku | 29 |
ẏete kahi śaṅkuni bāsudeba antarddhāne gale
hari hari sumari pāṇḍabe nija nabaraku aile |30 |
purañchana rāiṇa doilā kurupati
tu yā brāhuṇa ho pāṇḍabaṅkara kati | 31 |
sūpakāra paṇeṇa pāka sañchi debu
biṣa paraśiṇa tu paṇḍaanta nāśibu | 32 |
nidrā yibe pāṇḍabe yebaṇa niśākāḷe
jadura ghare tu lagāibu anaḷe | 33–6192 |

div.head: {@duryyodhana ājñāre purocanara bāruṇābanta gamana@}

lg.l: rājāra āgyāṁ se pāiṇa purañchana
bāruṇābantaku se caḷai bahana | 1 |
āṣāḍha māsa biṣṭi ye pūrṇṇamīra dina
uttarāṣāḍhā nakṣatra ye dhanu bidyamāna | 2 |
se dina purañchana ye bāruṇābanta galā
yujheṣṭhiṅka sannidhye yāi prabeśa hoilā | 3 |
brāhmaṇaku dekhiṇa ye pachāranti debī konte
kebaṇa kāryye bipra aila kāhiṁra nimante | 4 |
brāhmaṇa boilā śuṇa bhojara kumārī
tumbhe ye dukha pāuacha pāka pacana | 5 |
muhiṁ ballaba jāṇai rāndhaṇā bidhāna
pāka rañchana kari muṁ deuthibi pratidina | 6 |
purañchana boilā dhr̥tarāṣṭa boli yebaṇa rāẏe
tumbhara cintāku tāra anubrate dhyāẏe | 7 |
tāhāra putraṅku nāhiṁ tāhāṅkara cintā
anubrate dharai se pañcha putraṅkara kathā | 8 |
purañchana bacana śuṇi bolanti yujheṣṭhira
sahadebaṅku hakāri ẏekānte nr̥pabara | 9 |
brāhmaṇa caritra tu kemanta prāẏe maṇu
tu ye bitakṣaṇa bābu sabu kathā jāṇu | 10 |
sahadeba boilā deba uttara kośaḷe
gyānapura nagra boli gaṅgā nadī kūḷe | 11 |
nau sahasra ṣāṭhiẏe ghara tahiṁ ye basai
samasteheṁ kugyānī nāśa karanti manuṣyaiṁ | 12 |
tahiṁra mahājana ẏe aṭai śāsenī
pāpa prakr̥ti deba aṭai kugyānī | 13 |
gauḍiā ghokhara ẏe atai manda bāṭi
ghara bhiāilā ẏe jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭi | 14 |
bhīmasena ṭhākuraṅku ẏeṭi dilā biṣa laḍu
ẏebe āmbhanta ẏe nāśa kariba neiṇa biṣa yogāḍu | 15 |
yujheṣṭhi boile raha raha re sahadeba
bhīmasena jāṇile ehāku prāṇe nāśa kariba | 16 |
sabya hou ki asabya hou aṭai brāhmaṇa
athabongbedī ẏe bahai bipra lakṣaṇa | 17 |
ẏehāra pāpe ho nāśa yāu ẏehi
brahmahatyā doṣa na lagu āmbhakaiṁ | 18 |
mohora śapata bābu saṅgharaṇa kara garbhe
kadāścite na kahibuṭi bhīmasenara āge | 19 |

div.note: yāga pāga pratipāḷa ye aṭai kugyānī |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi boile ho śuṇimā paṇḍāẏe
tumbhanta hakāri yebe peṣile pitāẏe | 20 |
ādihuṁ jāta hoilū śataśiṁga pabongte
bana phaḷa bhmañju āmbhe thāuṁ ye banaste | 21 |
banastahuṁ ebe āmbhara sehi se prakr̥ti
anna meñjane āmbhe nohu nātriputi | 22 |
pitā yebe peṣile tumbhe thāa āmbha tule
anna pāñcha na kari deba āmbhara icchā ye hoile | 23–6214 |

div.head: {@bidura jatugr̥ha dvāre prabeśa@}

lg.l: rahile purañchana yujheṣṭhiṅkara tule
hr̥dare pāpa citta bāhāre aneka pīrati baḍhāile | 1 |
kumbha masa śukaḷa pakṣa aṭai tithi traẏodaśī
gurubāra dina puṣyā nakṣatrara beḷe āsi | 2 |
se dina rātrakāḷe āsi bije kale bidure
prabeśa hoile sehu jadughara dvāre | 3 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki toḷi se paṇḍita mahābhigyaṁ
rātrare sannidhyeṇa basāi kahanti sabonggyaṁ | 4 |
bābu dhr̥tarāṣṭa caritra maṇilu ki mane
abhiṣeka karāi loḍai driyodhane | 5 |
āmbhanta gheni bhāḷilā snnidhye basāi
bhīṣme boile yujheṣṭhi thāu driyodhanaku pāṭa nāhiṁ | 6 |
tāha śuṇi kopa kalā rājā andha
teṇu kari tumbhanta cintalā paramāda | 7 |

div.note: tāhā śuṇi kopa kalā se mānagobnda
madhy piṅgaḷa jāji se aṭai baḍa manda
tā ṭhāru manda aṭai bāpa tāa andha |

lg.l: gokharā brāhmaṇa ẏe aṭai mahāduṣṭa
bhīmasenaku biṣalaḍu khuāilā ẏe pāpiṣṭha | 8 |
dharmeṇa pāra hoilā tohora anuja
samasta hetu kari hr̥daẏe tohora bujha | 9 |
āho ẏe pura bhiāilā purañchana kapaṭe
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chanapaṭe | 10 |
yebaṇa pākaṭi kariba rañchana
sabuhiṁ biṣa tāhā na karibaṭi bhojana | 11 |
rātra re bābu re tumbhe yebe nidrā yiba
sehi dina brāhmaṇa ẏe pura poḍi deba | 12 |
agni na thibaṭi jadugharara bhitare
ẏehā ceti karyya ho karasi nirbhare | 13 |
se abā bāpa re tumbhanta cintilā pāpa citta
gupate pāra hoa samaẏe na thāa ẏetha | 14 |
ke kemante bichara karai tathya kari
tumbhara cntāhiṁ se thibi hr̥de dhari | 15 |
ẏete kahi se gale ambubatīra suta
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅku praḷambita kaleka turita | 16 |
kalyāṇa bāñcchā ye karai kurubai
āsana pāiṇa ye basai tahiṁ yāiṁ | 17 |
yujheṣṭhi deba hakārile ye bhīmasenaku
tu sabu rātreṇa icchā ye na karibu nidrāku | 18 |
mahā banasta ẏe daita dānabaṅka bhumi
byāghra bhalluka maẏematta hastī ẏethi aneka biśrāmi | 19 |
dibase kṣepai māruti ghora bane
khāija jība māri bhmañjai pratidine | 20 |
kandamūḷa rākṣa bhmañjai kṣudhābeḷa jaṇi
bhīmasena jadughare bhramuthāi se raẏaṇī | 21 |
pātāḷa bhmabane bhīmasena ye belabāḷīki pradāna doilā
tāhāra tahuṁ baḷībelāuḷa nāme putreka upujilā | 22 |
baḍāi sundara se ati baḷabantā
anantara nati se aneka śāhāsre nirjitā | 23 |
ruṣabha māsa śikaḷa pakṣa daśamīra dina
somabāra se dina nakṣatra hastākanya | 24 |
se dina purañchana paṇḍā galā hastinā bhmabanaku
bāratā kahilā yāiṁ driyodhana rājāku | 25 |
āho anna pāñchana nāhiṁ pāṇḍabaṅkara
kandamūḷa bhakṣanti se yehne banacara | 26 |
agni bibarjita deba kaleka jadura ghare
loḍile na pāi agni gahana banastare | 27 |
āna gharamāna yebeṭi thāi sannidhāne
tebe agni pāibā leḍibā bidhāne | 28 |
śaṅkuni boilā mohora bacana karibā
jhimāṇiśāḷamānanta ye tahiṁ toḷāibā | 29 |
sāñjaa ghaṭaṇa ye karuthānti bindhāṇimāne tahiṁ
loḍibāra beḷe ye pāibāka jui | 30 |

div.note: tebe se agni pāibā nā gr̥hasthāne |

lg.l: yetebeḷe nidrā ye yāānti raẏaṇī
jhimāṇiśāḷuṁ agni āṇi lagāi debā puṇi | 31 |
śaṅkunira bacana ye śuṇilā se managobinda
ghaṭaṇa bindhāṇi mānanta rāi āgyāṁ dila se narendra | 32 |
śāḍhī saraḷa aneka ratna dilāka badhāi
sahaste śāḷa bhiāa bābuṇābante rahi | 33 |
nadīra sannidheṇa ābar banasta nikaṭa
aṅgāra poḍibāku tahiṁ pāibāka aneka kāṭha | 34 |
bhrāthamāne mora ye rahile tahiṁ yāi
pāṇḍabanta sapakṣa tumbhemāne thiba hoi | 35 |
āpaṇe bije kale mahāmantrī śaṅkuni
bāruṇābante prabeśa hoile bindhāṇimānanta gheni | 36 |
yadura ghara beḍhāi pātile mahākhaḷā
śaṅkuni sannidhe prabeśa hoile paṇḍurājāra baḷā | 37 |
mātuḷa boli kari kale namaskāra
ẏe kisa bhiāṇa boli pachārile yujheṣṭhira | 38 |
śaṅkuni boilā tu śuṇa dharmasuta
śuṇasi sābadhāne kahai tote sata | 39 |
purañchana paṇḍā ye yāi dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅku kahile
mahāghora araṇye tora poẏe ẏekā hoi rahile | 40 |
śuṇiṇa driyodhana hoilā mahābega
jhimāṇiśāḷa mānanta tumbhanta dilā sāṅga | 41 |

div.note:
“bāruṇābante prabeśa hoile bindhāṇi mānanta gheni” pare
mudrita pustakare–
kāṭha kāṭi jamā kale banastaru bahi |

lg.l: śaṅkuni kahilā ye pāṇḍabeṅkura sannidhāne
nirbhaẏe hoiṇa tumbhe thiba nā ghora bane | 42 |
rātra dibase bindhaṇi karuthibe ghaṭaṇa
pañchadaśa māse sabu hoiba saṅpūrṇṇa | 43 |
dvādaśa naḷe bakharāẏe karanti nibongāṇa | 44 |
ẏemante sahasra bakharā ghara hoilā nirmita
lohakāra bindhaṇimāne lāgile samasta | 45 |
purañchana thāi ho se pāṇḍabaṅkara tule
tumbhanta saṅga bābu karāili mohora bole | 46 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tmbhe mahābhigyaṁ paṇḍita
dhārmika bibeka tumbhe beda śāsrare nirjita | 47 |
tmbhara gyāne ki hoi pāpa kathā
dharmahiṁ sāhāsakṣa hoiba nā sarbathā | 48 |
rahilā dvijabara yujheṣṭhiṅkara tule
jhimāṇīśāḷa bindhaṇimāne śāḷanta sirjile | 49–6264 |
lg.head: {@jhimāṇiśāḷa nirmāṇa@}
lg.l: siṁgha śukaḷa traẏodaśī tithi arkabāra
dhaniṣṭhā nakṣatra kumbha rāśi bhogya aṭai se dinara | 1 |
bidura mahātmā ye bije kale niśākāḷe
bhīmasenakai dekhile bāruṇābanta pabongtara taḷe | 2 |
yujheṣṭhiṅki hakāri āṇa mora kati
āgyāṁ pramāṇe bege caḷai māruti | 3 |
yujheṣṭhi arjunagku gheniṇa brikodara
biduraṅku bhetile se suranadī tīra | 4 |
bidura kahile tu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
anubrate kapaṭa tumbhanta cintai dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 5 |
jhimāṇiśāḷa bindhāṇimānanta toho sanidhye ruhāi
tahiṁra tadantamāna jāṇiluṭi tuhi | 6 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta thili muhiṁ ẏekā
datya dānabaṅku mote lāguthilā baḍa śaṅkā | 7 |
śaṅkuni prasanne muṁ hoili nirbhaẏe
apāra sāṅga muṁ pāili pitāmahe | 8 |
se mohora tāta ye aṭanti dhr̥tarāṣṭa
sakaḷa cintā karibāku bongśaku sehu śroṣṭha | 9 |
aneka kāḷa muṁ rahili ghora bane
aneka araṣṭi bañchili dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅka prasanne | 10 |
bidua boile tu dharma na chāḍibu kadācite
dhr̥tarāṣṭara prakr̥ti tote nohai nāẏemante | 11 |
yemante nāśayiba tumbhe pāñcha bhāi
tahiṁki buddhi hāde anubrate cintuacchi sehi | 12 |
tu ye boluachu hr̥dagate dhr̥tarāṣṭa mohora pitā
kebaṇa bāge sahibaṭi tāku dharma ye bidhātā | 13 |
bābu jhimāṇiśāḷamāna ye toḷāilā yatane
agni na pāilā yahuṁ purañchana tohora bhmabane | 14 |
jhimāṇiśāḷamāna ye ẏethi nimanteṭi
agni gheni purañchana dahiba niśārāti | 15 |
bābu emanteṭi hāde dhr̥tirāṣṭa citta kathā
bābu sābadhāna hoithāa ẏemanta bebastā | 16 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta tohora yebe ẏeheneka cintā
ke mote trailokye acchi pramāda bihantā | 17 |
kahiṇa bidura ye gale nija sthāne
yujheṣṭhi prabeśa hoile bāruṇābanta bhmabane | 18 |
hasteṇa khaḍaga ye gheniṇa bidura
hastinā bhmabane ye bhramai pure pura | 19 |
niśākāḷe yānteṇa hastinā bhmabana bhrami
tuleṇa kehi nāhiṁ ẏekasare rāẏe gami | 20 |
puruṣeka dekhile se bulai kondi kondi
cirakuṭī basreka se katire acchi pinddha | 21 |
naẏene añjana ye mathāre keśa hīne
parapañcha abasta se basrara bihune | 22 |
niśāpatiki dekhiṇa se hoilā gupata
dhāiṁ yāi bidure ye dhaile tāra hasta | 23 |
bidure boile re tu aṭu kāhāra kati
prapañcha abastāṛe tu diśu hīna jāti | 24 |
ẏe hastinā bhmabane ẏemanta loka dekhila ta nāhiṁ
ẏeheneka dāridra abastā hoilu tuhi kāhiṁ | 25 |
ẏethira sarūpa kaha tu mohora agrate
micha kahile prāṇe nāśibiṭi tote | 26–6290 |
lg.head: {@khanikāra ṭasakara br̥ttānta@}
lg.l: bidua bacane se bolai ṭasakara
muhiṁ yebaṇa jāti śuṇimā daṇḍadhara | 1 |
muhiṁ ṭasakara ye aṭai yugate
bidura boile ṭasakara jātire kemante | 2 |
muṁ aṭai hāde cauryya hīna jāti
ghara bāsa nāhiṁ mora cauryya karmeṇa brati | 3 |
puṇa pachārai ambubatīra bāḷa
kebaṇa mate paradhana cauryya ye kara | 4 |
lg.note: āna beusā nāhiṁ mu cauryya karme brati |
lg.l: kāntha khoḷiṇa deba paśai bhitare
para dhana cauryya kari niẏe niśākāḷe | 5 |
bidure boile thānti kabāṭa pāḍi kari
kebaṇa bage paśa tāhāṅkara bhitara purī | 6 |
kahai ṭasakara śuṇimā gosāiṁ
chārikhāni caurāśi lakṣa jantu nārāẏaṇa bhiāi | 7 |
caura boli kari ẏeka jātiẏe bhiāilā
lakṣaṇā daṇḍa boli śasreka srikilā | 8 |
tāhā gheni kāntha khoḷai niśā rāti
bhitareṇa paśile deba kehi na jāṇanti | 9 |
bidure boile tāra sarūpa mote kaha
kāhā hāthe lakṣaṇā re ketebeḷe gaḍhaa | 10 |
kahai khanikāra svāmī śuṇimā sābadhāne
tuḷamāsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa amābai caṇḍīpūjā dine | 11 |
biśākhā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara
se dina lakṣaṇāku karanti bachāra | 12 |
tahiṁra pāhanti yebe robai abaḷā
cauryya bidyāku se aṭai śubha anakūḷā | 13 |
yeuṇa mahāraṇāra kr̥ttikā br̥ṣa rāśi
tāhāku baraṇa kari amābai niśi | 14 |
prāte svāhana kari kaḷā basreka thāi pinddha
malā māipaṅka śaṅkhā patiẏe bāma haste bānddha | 15 |
rātra hoileṇa śāḷayantra pūjā kari
nabatana agni loha pāṣāṇaru uttāri | 16 |
lg.note: tāhāku baraṇa kari āmbhe gheni āsi |
lg.l: rātra tini prahare kr̥ṣṇa chāgaḷeka nei
cauruṇī debīṅki rakata bhāta baḷi dei | 17 |
bho deba abaḷāmānaṅkara ye prathama rāba bobāḷi
agnire nei luhā sijhāi paritāḷi | 18 |
yogeṇa nibongāṇa se karai mahāraṇā
triadhāra kari daṇḍa karāi lakṣaṇā | 19 |
bho deba bidura śuṇimā sābadhāne
āpane sañthile tāhā deba janārddane | 20 |
svāmī gopapure janama ye hoile banamāḷī
raṅgā abatāre biḷasile candrābaḷī | 21 |
śrīhari rādhāra tule aneka pīrati
candraseṇa guāḷa rādhāra na chāḍai kati | 22 |
rātrare śuāi thāi tāhāra nija gambhīri
aneka yatane ye kabāṭa kiḷi kari | 23 |
madana ārata hoi deba banamāḷī
rādhāra nimante ye rātre bulanti antarāḷi | 24 |
sāta kabāṭa antareṇa candraseṇā śoicchi rādhikāṅku gheni
paśi ta bāṭa loḍi na pāile deba svāmī raẏeṇī | 25 |
asambhāḷa hoi svāmī madana ārate
rāgeṇa kabāṭa hari pelanti heṭha māthe | 26 |
kabāṭa kaṇṭā goṭiẏe lāgilā kapāḷa
lalāṭa phuṭiṇa rudhira bahai jhara jhara | 27 |
dhātāṅku cintā ye lāgilā mane baḍa bhrnti
nārāẏaṇaṅku prasanna hoile pitāmaha dhāti | 28 |
lg.note: sukuṭī camāruṇī, pitei sauruṇī ẏemāne debī aṭanti |
cauruṇī debī, sauruṇī, cauṇī, caurāṇī, calaṇā, caurāṇi
sauriṇi, caṇḍīdebīṅku parbhr̥ti pāṭha bhinna bhinna pothire acchi |
lg.l: rudhira bahante hari pakābanti pocchi
kaṭākṣa mantreṇa bedabara phuṅkunti śrībatsi | 29 |
nārāẏaṇaṅka rudhira ruhāile bedapati
pitāmaha bije kale nārāẏaṇaṅkara kati | 30 |
bho deba nārāẏaṇa ki hoila birahita
gopāḷa nirodhi kala puṣpekara duhita | 31 |
ẏe loha yantra tote deucchi banamāḷī
ẏehā bheni bhitare paśa kāntha khoḷi | 32 |
se śahasra goṭi gheni deba ye acyuta
brahmāra māẏāre ye na śubhai kāhāku
kāntha khoḷi banamāḷī paśile bhitaraku | 34 |
rādhikāku lāgiacchi kāmaśara bādhā
keśabara śr̥ṅgāraku laẏe kariacchi rādhā | 35 |
añjana bidyā ye deithile bedapati
naẏane lagāi hari chāhiṁle caukati | 36 |
dibasa yesaneka diśai āluamaẏe
andhāra ghara diśai sūryya udaẏa parāẏe | 37 |
āreka bidyāẏe kahile bedabare
nidrādhūḷi guḍāẏeka dile nārāẏaṇaṅka hastare | 38 |
tāhā nei pakaile gopāḷa upare
asaṣṭāme nidrāre paḍile gauḍe | 39 |
rādhāra hātha dhari nārāẏaṇa toḷi
dhātikāreṇa uthiṇa se ye basilā candrābaḷī | 40 |
rādhāra hasta dhari paiṭhi gambhiri
haraṣe bāsudeba trīḍāraṅga kari | 41 |
rasa khaḷita hoi bhāgilā sarāga
sehi bāṭe bāhāra hoile śrīraṅga | 42 |
keśaba bichāranti ẏe bimbare hoilā kāryyasiddhi
ẏehi bimbare sabongkāḷe kāryya hoiba prasiddhi | 43 |
ẏemante nārāẏaṇa lakṣe śr̥ṅgāra kale
teṇu ẏe śahasra goṭiku lakṣaṇā nāma dile | 44 |
ẏe bidyāre aneka kāryya siddhi kariṇa kahnāi
mote dileka añjana kajjaḷa bidyā nidā guṇḍi siddhadāẏī | 45 |
bidure boile baḍāi susañcha parastāba
tohora keśabara eḍe kahiṁ bhāba | 46 |
binaẏa bhāba hoi kahai khalyakāra
bāsudeba ye gopapure raṅgā abatāra | 47 |
rādhāra tule yahuṁ na paile pīrati
sannidhye hakārile sarahasundarī dūtī | 48 |
se amara sundarī svargara aṭai dūtakārī
ẏehāra mūḷe bhogya cauṣaṭhī koṭi bidyādharī | 49 |
stambhana mohana ye baśya uccāṭana
guṭika añjana ye dharaṇa dhāraṇa | 50 |
samasta bidyā ye jāṇaiṁ sarahasundarī
bhība rasa bacane pāṣāṇa hoẏe jaḍi | 51 |
nandapua kahnāi boli nindā karuthile
se sarahasundarī dūtikāra bacane samaste baśa hoile | 52 |
baiśākha śukaḷa pakṣa cauṭhīra dina
rohiṇī bhoga yāi mr̥gaśīrā saṅpūrṇṇa | 53 |

div.note: ẏemante gobinda lakṣe gopastirī ramaṇa kale |
añjana guṭikā guṇḍi hari mote dei |
dharaṇa dhāra nibongāṇa (nirmāṇa) sarada sundarī dūtī |
bhāba rase jaṇe se paṣāṇa taraḷa kari |

lg.l: se dina rādhikā pureṇa acchi rahi
śāśu rala tāra jhiaku śāśugharaku puāi | 54 |
basanta ucchaba ye mathurā nagrapura
dahi dudha ghr̥ta sara ghenigale gauḍe kaṁsara chāmura | 55 |
gopāḷuṇī galā yahuṁ śūnya mandira hoilā
se sarahasundarī dūtikāṅku rādhikā hakārilā | 56 |
āpaṇāra aḷaṅkāramāna samasta kāḍhi dilā
se sarahasundarīki rādhikā maṇḍilā | 57 |
āpaṇāra alekha tiḷaka basra pindhāi
kaberī bhāra khoṣā khoṣilā puṣpa māḷā lāi | 58 |
kastūrī gandha ye lepana kalā tāra aṅge
āpaṇāra tāmboḷa bhmñjāi adhara kalā suraṅge | 59 |
boilā sagghāta go yāa ẏehi kṣaṇa
nanda pua kahnāi ki bahana kari āṇa | 60 |
āpaṇāra nepura kāḍhi dūtikā pāde dei
rādhikāra bacane sarahasundarī caḷai | 61 |
rādhikāra nimante deba madhuharī
mādhabī latā taḷe chanti patha anusari | 62 |
kṣaṇe yamunā kūḷe kṣaṇe kadamba br̥kṣe uṭhi
para dārā śr̥ṅgāre hari ẏeheneka kaṣṭi | 63 |
ẏemante panthā anusaranti jagannātha
nepura dhūni śubhilā dūtikā gabanara patha | 64 |
dhātikāre ḍeiṁ paḍile kadambara ḍāḷuṁ
araṅga naẏane hari chāhāṁnti heḷu heḷu | 65 |
madana rase buḍāi achanti kr̥ṣṇa nija kāẏe
dūtikāku dekhile suḍhaḷa ābharaṇamaẏe | 66 |
kāma ārateṇa ye deba madhuhārī
rādhikā boli hari dūtikāku koḷa kari | 67 |
madana ārate deba kicchi nuāri pachāri
dūtikāra pinddhalā basana deba pakāile pheḍi | 68 |
biśeṣe kuñjalatā gahana gorabana
basanta rutu malaẏāḷa khedai madana | 69 |
basanta kokiḷa dhuni diai se rutu
manasija bāṇaghāte dahai kāma tattu | 70 |
ẏeheneka bhrānti kalāka kāmadeba
para magyānī nātha na pailā sadibhāba | 71 |
rādhikāra beśa aḷaṅkāramāna naẏaneṇa dekhi
rādhikā boli śr̥ṅgāra kaleka dūtīka | 72 |
heṭha ubuḍāẏe śr̥ṅgāra rasa bhoḷe
mukhe cumbana dei se bhiḍanti bakṣasthaḷe | 73 |
madana ārate deba asambhāḷa gheni
mukhe mikha lagāiṁ ye na pāranti cihni | 74 |

div.note: madana śara ye ghārai nija kāẏe
parama brahma nātha dhari na pārile svabhāba |

lg.l: dūtikā boliṇa se yebaṇa yubatī
tāhāra baẏase ye nahiṁ kehi pr̥thī | 75 |
pācilā keśa tāra ati gaḷita khaḷīta kāẏe
parapañcha diśai ye kendu kāṭha prāẏe | 76 |
atihiṁ uccharga ye praḷamba hātha goḍa
tāhāra tule hari śr̥ṅgāra rasa kheḍa | 77 |
ati ārate yahuṁ hari buḍāile kāẏe
dūtikā pācilā keśa diśilā ye sebatī pākhuḍā prāẏe | 78 |
