hāsya lāsya rati raṅge śr̥ṅgāra rasa bhabe
lakha dantaghāte śarīra bidārile prastābe | 79 |
bāḷuta puruṣaku br̥ddhastirī bhāba
uṣate mahantārī sahai chāṭu bhāba | 80 |
hr̥daku hr̥da bhiḍi mukhe diai cumbana
preme bolanti priẏe mora rakhasi jībana | 81 |
sārthuka puruṣa se śr̥ṅgāreṇa jitā
dūtīhiṁ aneka kaḷara br̥ddha ye banitā | 82 |
apāra kaḷe pāila baḷuta pua goṭi
rasa raṅga śr̥ṅgāre sarahasundarī phuṭi | 83 |
rādhikā boli hari thileni kheda kari
hāde śr̥ṅgāra ante dūtikā paḍilā asāṣṭama dhāḍi | 84 |
yetebeḷe rasa khaḷīta hoilā
kāma bhrāṣṭa hoante srāgahiṁ bhāṁjilā | 85 |
chāḍiṇa basile deba śr̥ṅgāra upekṣi
dūtikāra barṇṇa cihna sāṣṭama hoi dekhi | 86 |
nāsāre hasta dei hasile janārddana
bisarile pañchumana basra pinddhabāku nāhiṁ mana | 87 |
yahuṁṇa keśaba basile mathā poti
asambhaḷa hoiṇa paḷāilā dūtī | 88 |
āpaṇāra basra bāri nuārilā
bege bege kahnāi basra pinddha paḷāilā | 89 |
basra na pindhanti hari na bāndhanti keśa
rādhikāku chāḍi dūtikāre kali ratirasa | 90 |
kebaṇa kalaiṁ pāpa ẏe kāmara anīti
mohora bhaḷiki bihilā ẏete baḍa śāsti | 91 |
kāhāra bole muhiṁ kalaiṁ ẏeḍe kathā
mānabamānanta ta hoiba aneka abastā | 92 |
muhiṁ yāha kali tahiṁki goḍāiba saṅsāra
guru gaurobante hoiba aneka abebhāra | 93 |
br̥ddha baẏasa ta nuārili muhiṁ bāri
thābake buḍili muṁ kāma mahābhāri | 94 |
kete kāḷara se mahantā nārī goṭā
tāhākai kāma mote karāilā ceraṣṭā | 95 |
na puṇa rādhikāra chāmure kahai yāi
aneka upahāsya mote karibe ye rāhī | 96 |
bho sarasvatī dūtikāra kaṇṭhe hoa āliṅgana
ẏe kathā māna na kahu dūtikā rādhikā āgare a | 97 |
puṇi bichārile strīṅkara baḍa gabong
para dārā śr̥ṅgāra kimpāi ānaku kahiba | 98 |

div.note: bho sarasvatī dūtikāra kaṇṭhe hua ābharaṇa |

lg.l: yadyapi kahiba ẏe rādhikāra āga
rādhakā śuṇile ẏehāku kariba mahārāga | 99 |
ẏeteka bichāri se uṭhile deba hari
basra toḷi dekhile dūtikā pālaṭā śāḍhi | 100 |
tādekhi svāmī mana duguṇa birasa
kathā anusari ye māḍilā puṇa hasa | 101 |
ẏeheneka abastā kaluṭi anaṅga
jagabandana puruku kalu ẏesaneka yoga | 102 |
para dārā śr̥ṅgāra ye nohu ḥoḍu poḍu
para dārāku ye icchiba śarīra tāra chāḍu | 103 |
paradārāharaṇe ye ẏeheneka abastā
keuṁṇa rase muṁ bhiāili ẏeḍe kathā | 104 |
para dārā strī ye amr̥ta tahuṁ suāda
ẏebe se jāṇili para dārā paramāda | 105 |
narāẏaṇa birasa ye hoile ẏesane
paradārāku na baḍha saṅsāra janamāne | 106 |
kāmenī kāmaseṇī se kauṁrī kāmākṣī
stirī kuḷaku hāde se kāma deiacchi | 107 |
kamaḷā piṅgaḷā bagaḷā mātaṅgī abhaẏā
kaḷmaṣanāśinī kamaḷākṣī bimaḷā bijaẏā | 108 |
kāmākṣī sumara nare kāma kaṣṭa chāḍu
svadārā ichā kara saṅsāra na paḍu | 109 |
kāma sāgara boli ta akāda mahājaḷa
kāhākaiṁ dr̥śya nahiṁ ye tahiṁra thaḷakūḷa | 110 |

div.note:
mudrita pustakare (rādhāmohana) kamaḷā piṅgaḷā mātā śabaḷā bihvaḷā
saraḷā taraḷā kaḷā bimaḷā sāraḷā |
para dārāku saghara saṅsāra na tuṭu |

lg.l: jagamohana puruṣara bhājilā ẏeḍe darpa
para dārā se upujāi sakaḷa pāpa | 111 |
kṣaṇaka mātra sinā para dārā rasa saṅga
kṣaṇaka uttāre se hoẏe sabong bhaṅga | 112 |
kāmākṣī kāmaseṇī caraṇe sebā niti
para dāra saṅgare mora na baḷāa mati | 113 |
paradārā kaṣṭa ye aṭai ẏemanta
para dukhe kātara tu go sabuṅgari māta | 114 |
tohora āgyāṁẏe kahili śūdramuni mohora nāma
ẏe kathāku antara mote na karāa matibhrama | 115 |
tuhi se siṁhabāhinī go pratyakṣe hiṅguḷā
ẏe saṅsāra janaṅku abhaẏa diasi siddha sāraḷā | 116 |
muhiṁ tora putra ye sāroḷā dāsa boli
abaśya pāibai muhiṁ yāhā bāñcchā kali | 117–6407 |

div.head: {@śrīhariṅkara bāḷalīḷā o khanikārara bibara nirmaṇa@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu putgha kale agastiṅki
baḍāi caritra kahila baḍāi rasa bāki | 1 |
dūtīra tattiṣṭa basra ye nārāẏaṇa dekhile
āpaṇā basra boli śrīkare ghenile | 2 |
mane birasa hoi pakāile bhūmi
kisa basra pinddhale jagata-bhūta svāmī | 3 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho manu puruṣa
basra pakāi ulagne basile hr̥ṣīkeśa | 4 |
bāāṁśa gotẏe bhājñjile debahari
laheṇa cirile tāhā beniphāḷa kari | 5 |
komaḷa susañtha hoi bāharilāka śira
kāchaṭā kale nei tāhā kaṭire kari ḍora | 6 |
beṇu basra goṭi ye kaṭire bhiḍile
puṇa agastiṅki baibasuta manu pachārile | 7 |
bho muni dūtikā galā ye rādhikā chāmuku
kisa uttara boilā sarahasundarī tāhāgku | 8 |
alekha tiḷaka hoi basicchi rādheba
biṣṇu abhisārikā ẏe āsibe bāsudeba | 9 |
chāmure prabeśahoilā sarahasundarī dūtī
jhāḷeṇa tripaṇḍa ye birasa tāra mati | 10 |
sarahasundarīki pacārai rādhikā
keśaba nu āsuṁ sakhī ailu tu ẏekā | 11 |
dūtī boilā rādhā ye tohora yete bega
tuku hiṁ tāhāra nāhiṁ ẏeḍe srāga | 12 |
rādhikā boilā āī ẏe tohora adhara
birasa diśai ta cumbilā ākāra | 13 |
dūtikā boilā lo śuṇa saṅghātuṇī
tohora paiṁ boili aneka chāṭu bāṇī | 14 |
aneka cāṭu paṭaḷa kali ujāiṁ prakāśa
kahi kahi kaṇṭha śukhilā teṇu mohora adhara birasa | 15 |
cāṭu paṭaḷa kahili aneka ye rañja
muhiṁ se phuṭili tote se kebeheṁ na bhaji | 16 |
rādhikā boilā khopā khoṣili susañcha kari
āuḷa hoi muhaṁ katiki paḍai mādī | 17 |
dūtikā boilā śuṇa go rādheni
bacane na bhajilā ku tāku kalāi daẏeni | 18 |

div.note: kimpāiṁ ẏetabeḷa yāẏe na aile bāsudeba |
alekha tiḷaka hoi rādhikā chanti basi

lg.l: apāra beḷa yāẏe śutili paẏe paḍi
teṇu se khopā mohora leuti kapāḷaku paḍi | 19 |
rādhā boilele gaḷāre laili ratnamāḷī
piṭhikatiki samasta thopāmāna ḍhaḷi | 20 |
āgo piṭhi katiki ratnamāḷī hr̥dakatiki jhumpā
ẏeheneka bibhaḷita hoilā tohora kimpā | 21 |
dūtī boilā muhiṁ yetebeḷe śutili pāẏe paḍi
ratnamāḷa māna loṭilā teṇu gaṇṭhi pheḍi | 22 |
bikaḷe jhumpāmāna āgakatiki deli leuṭāi
hastake gaṇṭhi muṭhi dhaili niṭhāi | 23 |
temante ẏeṇiki leuṭilā pāṭajhumpā
rādhikā boilā sakhi to piṭhire dhūḷi kimpā | 24 |
yetebeḷe sakhi go dhaili māḷīra gaṇṭhimāna
leuṭāi pāḍilā mote muṁ paḍili uttāna | 25 |
temante piṭhire go mohora lāgilāka dhūḷi
tohore sahili muṁ ẏeteka āradoḷi | 26 |
rādhikā boile āī ẏe tohora kāẏe
bidāri hoiacchi lakha danta kṣata prāẏe 27 |
dūtī boilā apāra ghānti yahyṁ śutili aḍaghāli
na yāiṁ na yāiṁ boli mote pādare dilā peli | 28 |
kaṇṭikā laṭāẏe muṁ paḍili mahaṁ māḍi
kaṇṭāmāna lāgi śarīra mora cchiḍi | 29 |
rādhikā boile muhiṁ tote pindhāili mohora jhīnaśāḍhi
puruṣa basra goṭie ailu kipari pinddha kari | 30 |
dūtikā boilā muṁ aneka boili binoẏi
ẏete kaṣṭa dekhi āsibāku sanamata kalā sehi | 31 |
ẏete kaṣṭare se sanamata kalā
āja rātrare tāhāra puraku yibi se boilā | 32 |

div.note: ẏete kaṣṭa dekhi āsibāku sanamata kalā kahnāi |

lg.l: muhiṁ boili yebe yibu ājara niśi
mohora hāthe rādhikāku santaka desi | 33 |
rādhā samprate yāu tohora santaka dekhi
santaka dekhile samprate yāu candramukhī | 34 |
kr̥ṣṇa boile kicchi santaka nāhiṁ go dūtikā
pinddhalāra basra acchi mātra mora ẏekā | 35 |
muhiṁ boili ẏehā debu na pāliṭi
tu pindha kahnāi rādhikā śāḍhi goṭ | 36 |
tora basra boli hoilā uṣata
se śāḍhi āpaṇe inddhile jagannātha | 37 |
tāhāṅkara pinddhalā basra muhiṁ pinddhili
parace nimante muhiṁ santaka āṇili | 38 |
śuṇiṇa rādhikā ye parama sānanda citta
mhora pāiṁ āī pāila dukha bahuta | 39 |
aneka bikaḷa ye hoile rādhikā
bāḷuta kumārīkai bhaṇḍilā dūtikā | 40 |
ṭasakara kahilā deba śuṇimā bidura
dutikāku nārāẏaṇa kale ye śr̥ṅgāra | 41 |
sarahasundarīra garbhe ye paḍilā bāsudebara bīryya
nabamāse utapatti muṁ ye hoili ātmaja | 42 |
sarahasundarī boilā ẏe tohora bīryya heṭi
tote sebā kari thāu ẏe mohora putra goti | 43 |
dūtikāra garbharu muṁ holi abatāra
nāma mohora hari dile khalyakāra | 44 |
brahmāṅkara dila ye lakṣaṇā pratakṣe
tāhā mohora hāthe āṇi dileka śrībacche | 45 |
mote boile re tu kathāẏeka kara
kadamba taḷaku juṇe ye rādhikāra pura | 46 |
ẏehi kadamba taḷaku bimbara goṭie khoḷibu
rādhikāṅkara palaṅka teḷe neiṇa phuṭāibu bābu | 47 |
nārāẏaṇaṅka āgyāṁẏe muṁ khoḷīli bimbara
rādhikāra pure phuṭilā dina ye aṭhara | 48 |
tāḷeka utsarga bistāra tāḷa tini
rādhikā luchāi thāi bimbara pathareka gheni | 49 |
rātra hoile ye guāḷaku nidrā karāi
bimbare paśi rādhikā kadamba mūḷaku yāi | 50 |
ichāẏe śr̥ṅgāra diai se candrabadanī
gopāḷa katire yāi śoai rajanī | 51 |
mohora caritra tumbhe śuṇasi bidura
khalyakāra nāmeṇa muṁ aṭai ṭasakara | 52 |
śuṇiṇa bidura bichārai paramārtha
ẏehi mohora puakaiṁ hoibāka hita | 53 |
bidura pucchā kale śuṇa re mahābaḷī
kete dūra tu ho bimbara paru khoḷi | 54 |
khalyakāra bole yāhāra yete dūre huai kāryya
teteka sampādi muṁ pārai grāhija | 55 |
śuṇīṇa bidura ye parama sānande
ṭasakara gheniṇa caḷile nija phande | 56 |
tu yebe cauryya re bheṭiluni mote
ābara beḷe cauryyapaṇa karibu kemante | 57 |
dui adhikāra bidurara hastinā nagarī
nagra rakṣā karai ābara bhaṇḍāra adhikārī | 58 |
rātreṇa bidura tule gheniṇa khalyakāra
bhaṇḍāru pāṇidrabya dile ẏeka bhāra | 59 |
sukheṇa biḷasa tu rahi hastināpura
ābara beḷe cauryya paṇa na karibu khalyakāra | 60 |
dhana ratna māna poti thoilā nijapure
anubrate goḍāi thāi biduraṅka saṅgatare | 61 |
dineka ṭasakara boilā kara yoḍi
tumbhe ye mote poṣuacha muiṁ kisa upugāri | 62 |
bidura boile muiṁ tote poṣuacchi
tohoreṇa mote aneka karyya acchi | 63 |
kebaṇa mate tote muṁ karibi kāraṇa
āgyāṁ dia mote bhiāibi ẏehikṣaṇa | 64 |
bidure boile tu yebe garbhe karu gopya
kāhāri agrate na kahibuṭi re mohora bāpa | 65 |
tebe se bābu re kahi pārai tote
khalyakāra boilā muṁ nohai ẏemante | 66 |
mīnamāsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa dutīẏā bhr̥gubāra
hastā nakṣatrara śeṣa bhoga se dinara | 67 |
khalyakāra gheni ambubatīra bāḷa
benijane miḷile yāi suranadī kūḷa | 68 |
patha bulāiṇa gheniṇa gale ṭasakaraku
jadura ghare nei bheṭāile tāhāku | 69 |
suranadī kūḷaku jadura ghara ẏekādaśa juṇa
bābu bimbara goṭiẏe tahiṁ karibu niribāṇa | 70 |
khalyakāra boila kisa tohora cintā
muhiṁ se ẏehā ye aṭai bihantā | 71 |
nārāẏaṇa sumari se kalā śubha anakūḷa
triśirā pabongta taḷuṁ khoḷai bimbara | 72 |
bidure boile dvāparayuga deuḷa ucca yete
āṭha sahasra āṭha śata aṭhāiśa hātha pariyante | 73 |
ucca hoiba ye bistāra hoiba teḍe
ubhāre jaṇe yiba āsiba saṅpoḍe | 74 |
ṭasakara boilā tohora kāryya yete
āhuri bistāra muṁ kari pārai tete | 75 |
khalyakāra bimbare lagāi bidura
rātre āpaṇe nei dianti anna jaḷa | 76 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa purṇṇamīra dina
maṅgaḷabāra nakṣatrase dina pa bongphālagunya | 77 |
se dina hari baḷarāma beni bhrāthe
prabeśa hele hastinā rājye kurunātha agrate | 78 |
bidure dekhile rāma kr̥ṣṇa beni
aneka pūjā kale binoẏa daẏini | 79 |
āstānuṁ uṭhi deba bije kari yānte
pacheṇa goḍāi achanti ambubatīra | 80 |
āga hoi gale deba baḷarāme turite
ẏekānte biduraku pucchā kale jagannāthe | 81 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa pāṇḍabaṅku ye cintai paramāda
se pāra hoibe ẏekā tohora parasāda | 82 |
bidure boile mote na kaha ẏete kathā
svāmī tote se lāgai pāṇḍaṅka kathā | 83 |
driyodhana kūṭe jhimāṇīśala kalā bāruṇāpraśaste
jadura ghare dahana karāiba purañchana paṇḍā hāthe | 84 |
khalyakāra nāmeṇa ye ẏekai ṭasakara
tāhāku lagāi muhiṁ karāuacchi bimbara | 85 |
rātrakāḷe debe se ye jadura ghara jāḷi
se bimbara bāṭe pāṇḍabe ratre yibe gaḷi | 86 |
nārāẏaṇa boile se khalyakāra cauryya
sarahasundarī putra se āmbhara ātmaja | 87 |
āmbhe śikhāilu tāhāku cauryyapaṇa bidyā
bimbara khoḷi pārai se bacana saṅsiddhā | 88 |
bidure boile ho śuṇimā gosāiṁ
khalyakāra bacana se āhuri acchi kahi | 89 |
se ye khoḷuacchi deba bimbara goṭi
asabhāḷa hoi kāhiṁ sambhaḷiba māṭi | 90 |
khoḷibāku śakatāse aṭai dāmodara
kemante prakāre māṭi hoibāka dūra | 91 |
bidura tahuṁ ẏesaneka bacana śuṇi
mane mane bichāra se karanta catrapāṇi | 92 |
ẏete boli biśva mūrttiki dhaile
beni bhmajaru beni puruṣa bhiāile | 93 |
chāẏā māẏā nāme ye aṭanti beni bīra
tāhānta rāi āgyāṁ dileka dāmodara | 94 |
tumbhe duheṁ ẏebe suranadī kūḷaku yiba
khalyakāra bāma ḍāhāṇe lāgithiba | 95 |
yeteka bhūmi se khoḷiba pratakṣa
se mr̥ttikāmāna tumbhe duibhāi bhakṣa | 96 |
troṭa anaḷa ye thoile tāhaṅkara garbhe
se mr̥ttikāmāna dahana hoiba paḍile udara bhāge | 97 |
nārāẏaṇaṅka āgyāṁẏe se mahābīra beni
khalyakāraku sapakṣa hoile mr̥ttakā dahana kale bhāi beni | 98 |
khoḷanti ṭaskara ye bhakṣanti beni dakṣa
tiniheṁ bimbara ye bhiāile pratakṣa | 99–6506 |
śrābaṇa śukaḷa ye caturddaśī dina
bhragubāra uttarāṣāḍhā nakṣatra bidyamāna | 1 |
se dina bidura gale bāruṇābantaku
rātra aḍhai prahare bheṭile jadura gharadvāraku | 2 |
bāuna bāuna bhāra beni gadā dhari
rātrakāḷe bulai bhīma jadughara beḍhi | 3 |
biduraku dekhi bhīma ḍāka dilā ke ke ṭi re
āpaṇāra kāryya boli miḷile katire | 4 |
biduraṅku bhīmasena karai namaskāra
bābu tūnī hoi yāi tu yujheṣṭhiṅki hakāra | 5 |
tūnī kari toḷi āṇai yujheṣthiṅki
yujheṣṭhi binoẏi hoile ye biduraṅkai dekhi | 6 |
bidure boile tale karithāsi mane
bimbara goṭāe phuṭibaṭi jadughara thāne | 7 |
khalyakāra ṭāskaraku karibaṭi aneka gauroba
tāhāra prasāde tumbhe gopyāne pāra hoi yiba | 8 |
kaurobe tumbhanta jhighāsa karibe aneka
bhale pāri hoiyāa samaẏeka | 9 |
tumbhaṅku sāhāpakṣa aṭanti jagannathe
samaẏeka bañcha bābu dukhena banaste | 10 |
pāñchagoṭi bhrātha mātāṅku gheni chaḍa prāṇī
ẏeka ātmā hoithiba nohiba parāpara jāṇi | 11 |
mātāṅku sebā kari thibaṭi banaste
dukheṇa samaẏeka bābu bañcha pañchu bhrāthe | 12 |
ẏete kahi puṇa kahile bidura
purañchana hāteh kicchi na karibaṭi āhāra | 13 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tuhi ye āmbhara pitā
tuhi se aṭu āmbhanta dhrma ye debatā | 14 |
kahiṇa bidura galeka gahana banaste
suranadī tīre ye triśira pabongte | 15 |
bimbare paśile yāi mahā niśākāḷe
dekhile bimbara ye bistāra naba tāḷe | 16 |
dekhile bidure bimbara atihiṁ bistāra
baraṣake hoilāṇi pāñchayojana dūra | 17 |
aneka dhanaratna dile ye ṭaskaraku
tohora upugāra muṁ kahibi kāhāku | 18 |
ẏete boli bidure ye bāhāra hoile
suranadī kr̥ḷa nāba bāhuka kaibrataku dekhile | 19 |
nāba goṭi kūḷe lagāi basiacchi kaṇḍeẏāra
rātre jana aile kari diẏe pāra | 20 |
bidure boile re kebaṇa tu jāti
ẏe bana nadī kūḷe kimpe basilu niśārāti | 21 |
muṁ deba niṣāda aṭai kaibrata
nābare basāi pāra karai janamānanta | 22 |
paṇe boḍiẏe ye gaṇḍāẏe ādi kari
ẏeṇe bratai muṁ jībana āhāri | 23 |
bidurre boile e mānagobindara rājya
samasta jane ẏetheṁ bratanti aiśuryya | 24 |
tohora parāẏeka kaṣṭi loka ẏethi nāhiṁ
kete didna bañchibu tu jaḷacara hoi | 25 |
nāba goṭi buḍāi tu āsa ho kaibrata
ẏe tara paḍu loke nohantu ẏethe ātayāta | 26 |
bidura bacane nāba buḍāilā kaṇḍeẏāra
kaibrataku gheni tahuṁ galeka bidura | 27 |
bhaṇḍāra pheḍiṇa tāhāku dile aneka dhana
āpaṇāra pure tāku kaleka gopyāna | 28 |
bidura prasanne tāra kuṣṭa paragalā
dine se kaṇḍeẏāra biduragku pachārila | 29 |
ẏete dhana dile mote bhaṇḍāra pheḍi
muhiṁ chāra hīna tote kauṁguṇe hoibi upugārī | 30 |
bidure boile tu aṭu ye mahata
tohore kāraṇa mote achai bahuta | 31 |
kaibrata hasta kdhari nele niśākāḷe
bimbara sanna dhye hoile rātrakāḷe suranadī kūḷe | 32 |
bidure boile tu ẏehiṭhāre jagi basithibu
dibase nāba goṭi pāṇire buḍaibu | 33 |
rātreṇa paṇiru kāḍhi rakhibu bimbara dvāra
bimbaru ye āsai tāṅku kariṇa debu pāra | 34 |
pari kari debu suranadīra pacchima kūḷaku
tetebeḷe yāi bāratā kahibu āmbhaṅku | 35 |
bidura bacane se niṣāda kaibrata
nāba gheni jagi basilā se suranadī taṭa | 36 |
dibase nāba goṭi buḍāi ghare thāiṁ yaiṁ
rātre pāṇi nigāḍi bimbara dvāraku yae bāhi | 37 |
bimbara khoḷila ye ṭaskara khalyakāra
bimbare nibongāṇa hoilā baraṣa ẏegāra | 38 |
mīnamāsa śukaḷa pakṣa daśamīra niśi
bhaumabāra aśleṣā antare bhoga magha siṁgha rāśi | 39 |
sukarmā nāme yoga bāṇijya nāme karaṇa
rātra naba ghaḍi māne phiṭilā bimbara jadughara uttara kaśa | 40 |
sehi ṭhābare śoithilā bīra ye arjuna
dhātkāre ciāiṁ uṭhilā se bāsabara nāna | 41 |
ke re ke re boliṇa darāṇḍilā rāge
bāma kare ṭasakara keśa dhailāka bege | 42 |
bolai khalyakāra mote chāḍa bīra pārtha
bidura āgyāṁẏe muṁ tumbhara kāryye hita | 43 |
ẏesaneka bacana śuṇiṇa kirīṭī
tatakṣane ṭaskarara chāḍile keśa goṭi | 44 |
āśvāsanā kariṇa se bāsabara suta
katire basāi bāratā puchai turita | 45 |
katire basi kari ye kahai cauryya
ẏehi bimbre paśi tumbhe yiba debarāja | 46 |
dvādaśa baraṣaku mote aneka dhana dei
biduraṅka āgyāṁẏe muṁ bimbara bhiāi | 47 |
arjjuna toḷilā yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākuraṅku
yujheṣṭhi hakārile ye bhīmasena ku | 48 |
ẏe bimbara bhitare yāi paśani re maruti
kete thaḷa kete dīrgha kete uccharga ye prati | 49 |
yāi paribāṭi ki ẏe bimbareṇa paśi
āgyāṁẏe brikodara galāka mahaniśi | 50 |
bāuna bāuna gadābhāra beni hāthe
bimbara bhitare māruti gamai uṣate | 51 |
rurddhva bādu kari beni hātha toḷi galā
ākāśa prāẏe hoi se kāhim na lagilā | 52 |
ẏegāra yojana bimbara khedai brikodara
prabeśa māruti yāi sura nadīra ye tīra | 53 |
bāduḍā beḷaku māruti bistārila beni hasta
dui kati na lagilā ātraṣaṇa beni karapatra | 54 |
bichārai māruti ẏethi saṅāgrāma paḍile
yuddhaku ṭhāba ye hoibaṭiki dui bhmaja ātreṣile | 55 |
gadā bulai ye dui kare bīra
gadā kāhiṁ na hāboḍilā pātāḷa bimbara | 56 |
bhīṣma rūpa dhariṇa ye brikodara galā
jadura ghare yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi debaṅku kahilā | 57 |
baḍāiṁ āśriya deba ẏe ṭasakara kathā
debaṅku aśakya ẏe asambhaba baḷabantā | 58 |
yebaṇa bimbara ẏe sampādilā ṭasakara
mañcha svarga prāẏe deba kicchi nāhiṁ ye antara | 59 |
śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhi deba parama sānanda citte
ṭasakaraku aneka ratna dile jadughare thilā yete | 60 |
tu āmbha nimitte yete kaṣṭa pāilu khalyakāra
dharmeṇa rājya pāile tohora karibu upugāra | 61 |
ṭasakara boilā deba bidura mahātmā him thale
tumbhanta pañchu kaṭaka prāpata hoiba bhale | 62 |
nāmagiri nāme ye pabongta goṭāẏe
bimbara dvāreṇe nei bhīma chāpiṇa gopya kaẏe | 63 |
khalyakāra galāye bidura sannidhāne
bimbara parīkṣa kale pāṇḍaba bhīmasene | 64 |
śuṇiṇa bidura ye aneka sānande
khalyakārakai baduta dhana dileka ānande | 65 |
sehi rātre se ṭaskara ku tule gheni
jadura ghare prabeśa dibā anteṇa raẏaṇī | 66 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ jadura ghareṭi
pratkṣe bheṭile yāiṁ dharmarājā yujheṣṭhi | 67 |
bolanti muṁ ta sañchili ẏesaneka sandehe
dharme ẏethuṁ pāra hoiyāa samaẏeka bābhiẏe | 68 |
yemanta bābu re tumbhaṅku na jāṇḍi āna jane

jaḷaprabhā khāu mote muhiṁ ye paḍibi |
lg.l: dui haste dhariuparaku phaṅga dilā
jhiṇṭikā mūrtti prāẏe bhīma udare paśilā | 14 |
kumbhīra garbha diśai pātāḷa bimbara prāẏe
garbhare paśiacchi ye pabana tanaẏe | 15 |
tahuṁ nāba bāhi kari nelā kaṇḍeẏāra
chāri bhāi mātāẏe ohlaile kūḷara | 16 |
yujheṣṭhi aneka trodha kale bhīmaku na dekhi
abhikṣaṇa lua bahai beni ākhi | 17 |
nakuḷa sahadeba ābara kiraṭī
asāṣṭama hoiṇa se bhumireṇa loṭi | 18 |
āre āre mora kāhiṁ galu baḷabantā bhāi goṭi
aneka bikaḷe ye bolanti yujheṣṭhi | 19 |
keṇiki yibi bhīma re tohora abhāre
bāṭa kaḍhāiṇa ke neba mote ẏebe | 20 |
lg.note: ẏemānanta gheni bābu bula tumbhe sukhe
tumbhe kimpā yiba muhiṁ pache yibi
ābara bhāi kāhiṁ dekhibi mora ākhi
jhara jhara hoi lua bahai beni ākhi |
tuṇḍa bistārilā bhīmaku aḷape giḷi dilā |
keṇiki yibu bhīma re tote harāiṭi
godanti kābuṇya dhani aśr̥ jaḷa br̥ṣṭi |
lg.l: manda agni hoile yehne nibongḷa hoanti prāṇī
daśa diśa aṇdhāra helā mote jāti andha jāṇi | 21 |
ripu trāsa karuthilā tohora prākarma dekhi
tohora abhabeṇa muṁ hoili nirimākhi | 22 |
kointāẏe boile bābu kete karu śoka
raẏeṇī pāile puṇa jāṇime sabongloka | 23 |
hajilā baṇā lokaṅku bābu thibā ki bāṭa chāhiṁ
malā nuāsai bhasma kāhiṁ na āgkorai | 24 |
chāri puaṅkura ye hasta derī dhari
paśile gahana bane narasiṁgha sumari | 25 |
bhīma tūnī hoiacchi kumbhīrara garbhe
bhāi māāṅkara mana jāṇimā nā ẏehi parastābe | 26 |
yetebeḷe nirāśe se gale ghora bane
kumbhīra garbhe bhīṣmarūpa dhaile bhīmasene | 27 |
brikodara mūrati dhailā mahābaḷa
śarīra bikāśilā uccharga nabatāḷa | 28 |
pañchutāḷa uccharga ye kumbhīra garbha goṭi
mahā bhārā pāigalā tāra peṭa phāṭi | 29 |
kumbhīraku māri carma chauri bhīma kari
upare pakāi kari hoiṁ bāhāra jagnnāthaṅku sumari | 30 |
nāba goṭi gheni āsai kaṇḍeẏāra
rāgeṇa chapoḍeka māilā brikodara | 31 |
lg.note: mote debāku tuhi re sanamata kalu |
lg.l: tāhāṅkara bhaḷeṇire tuhi paśithilu
mote debāku boluṁ re tuhi sanamata kalu | 32 |
kopeṇa muṇḍa tāra pakāilā moḍi
nāba goṭi bhāñjilā śatakhaṇḍa kari | 33 |
prakopita badana hoiṁ dhāmaiṁ ghora bane
medinī kampuacchi tāra caraṇa uddāne | 34 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mā go muṇḍa ta poḍilā
keuṁṇa rākṣasa āmbhaṅku dekhiṇa dhāiṁlā | 35 |
āre mohora bhāi muhiṁ kimpāiṁ na mali
tote marāi muhiṁ saṅpoḍe nāśa gali | 36 |
lg.note: kope āji muṇḍa tora akantire moḍi
nāba goṭi bhāṅganta muṁ śate khaṇḍa kari |
ẏe kathā tu na kahiṇa karibu gopana |
āna kehi jāṇile tu sabongśe maribu |
bhaẏe nābika kahai rakha mora prāṇa
satya kahuacchi kebheṁ na kihibi kāhiṁ
ẏehā kahi nāba goṭi dila sehu bāhi |
ẏemanta dekhiṇa kare dhanu dhailā arjuna
puṇi hiṁ bāsabi se binddhalāka śara
paḍi hiṁ śahasra na bhedilā śabhīra |
puṇi hiṁ amogha śara peṣilā sabongsācī
lg.l: kointā boile bābu tu na bhāḷa yujheṣṭhi
dānaba nohai tohora bhāi bhīmasena heṭi | 37 |
yujheṣṭhi boilā mā go ẏeḍeka nirddaẏā
stibī liṅga hoi pāṣāṇa tora hiẏā | 38 |
garbhadhārī hoiṇa putraku marāi
garbha tohora go kicchihiṁ na bathāi | 39 |
kointāẏe boile bhrānti tu na kara kicchi
kumbhīra datya māri tora bhāi āsuacchi | 40 |
ẏesaneka bichāra karante deba dharme
sannidhyeṇa prabeśa hoile bīra bhīme | 41 |
kointāṅkara pāde bhīma hoilā pariṇāmi
bhīmaku koḷa kale yujheṣṭhi deba svāmī | 42 |
bābu āmbhara dekhante tote giḷilā kumbhīra
kebaṇa bāge bābu re hoiluṁ bāhāra | 43 |
lg.note: kumbhīraku dei mote ẏebe karucha sāṁgrāma |
kumbhībī chāla se ghoḍi ye hoiṇa
sannidhye yāi se ḍarāi puṇa puṇa |
bhīmaku khāi ẏebe āmbhaṅku kalā grasta |
bhīmasena bolai na ḍara tumbhe ẏebe
lg.l: bhīmasena boilā svāmī garbhe tāra thili
odara bidāri deba muṁ bāhāra hoili | 44 |
kahai bhīmasena sānanda toṣa mane
chālai pabana gati gora gahana bane | 45 |
hāboḍā ghāte br̥kṣa pabongta houchanti cūrā | 46 |
chāli na pāri kointāẏe basileka phuṭi
raha raha bhīmasena chāli na pārile māẏe boli bolanti yujheṣṭhi
bhīmasena boilā mātā go kemanta karantu
driyodhana beṇṭakāre bulanti ẏethuṁ kete kāḷa yā’ntu | 48 |
kointāṅku koḷa kari dhailā pābeni
mathāra upare basāilā kare gheni | 49 |
ḍāhāṇa kandhe yujheṣṭhi bāma kāndheṇa kiraṭī
nakuḷa sahadeba beni kākhe beni goṭi | 50 |
pabanahuṁ bege khepai bhīmasena
ghaḍike yāuacchi koḍiẏe yojana | 51 |
bana jībamāne paḷābanti ḍare
kutūhoḷe gaṇḍā gaẏaḷa haraṣe dharai brikodare | 52 |
baibasuta manu pucchā{?}kale agastiṅki
jadura gharu purañchana galā ye keṇiki | 53 |
śabaruṇī pañchaputre kale ye kemanta
ehā mote sañchapi kahibā tapobanta | 54 |

div.note: tumbhe o dharma ātmā jaṇiṇa bichāra |
ẏe dubugama patharu kemante pāra hoibāiṁ |

lg.l: agasti pratibākya śuṇa mahāmanu
jadura ghara dahilā ye pabanara tanu | 55 |
agnira teje ye paḍilā miḷāi
purañchana paṇḍā ye nāśa galā tahiṁ | 56 |
jaẏantā śabaruṇī pañchuputra gheni
mahānidraẏe se dadrana hoilā raẏeṇī | 57 |
śabaruṇī pañchaputra śabaruṇī ki gheni chaḍa jaṇa
tāhāṅkara tule ye malā purañchana brāhmaṇa | 58 |
ẏe sāte heṁ dahana hoile jadura ghare
samasta naśa gale agnira sambhare | 59 |–6770 |

div.head: {@śabaruṇīra pañchaputraṅkara pūbong br̥ttānta@}

lg.l: agastiṅki pucchā kale baibasuta manu
baḍa dulabha kathā kahila kumbha ruṣiṅka tanu | 1 |
keuṁṇa pātaka ẏehu karithile pūbonge
bina doṣe kemante dahana hoile aprastābe | 2 |
ẏehā kahibā mote paṇḍita bhigyaṁ yati
śuṇiṇa mahātamā ye phiṭiba mana bhrānti | 3 |
kahanti agasti śuṇa ho sābadhāne
pūbongra kr̥tye dahana hoile śabaruṇī putramāne | 4 |
biṁjhakalpa deśa rājā gādhi ye nr̥pati
bhojabaṁśeṇa sehu aṭai ādhipati | 5 |
se godhira nandana ye biśvāmitra rājā
mañcheṇa narapati se jāṇiṇa biḍojā | 6 |
digabije karai ye samasta dige paśi
aneka rākṣasa se mārai ātreṣi | 7 |
padmeka ratha tāra beni padma hastī
chāri sāgara aśva sāta kṣauṇī pādānti | 8 |
ẏeteka gheni rājā karai digabije
bana araśye khedi mārai danuje | 9 |
makaa śukaḷa pakṣa nabamīra tithi
se dina digabije kalā biśvāmitra nr̥pati | 10 |
araṇye khedai rājā annapāṇi nāhiṁ
daśamī ẏekādaśī ye khedai abagāhi | 11 |
tni dina upāse bheṭile satta bhrame
yānteṇa bheṭile yāiṁ baśiṣṭhaṅka āśrame | 12 |
dekhiṇa baśiṣṭhe tāṅku kaleka arghya pūjā
boile ati śrame kāhiṁ thila mahārājā | 13 |
rājā pratibākya asura upadarpe khedilu banabāse
māili aneka duṣṭa pichāśa rākṣase | 14 |
aśakate chāli nuāranti baḷa
tni dibasa helāni nāhiṁ anna meḷa | 15 |
baśiṣṭhe boile śuṇa biśvāmitra rāẏe
āmbhara tahiṁ acchi anna ye puḍāẏe | 16 |
goṭi chāri bhmañji tu yāa nr̥pamaṇi
biśvāmitra boile mohora baḷa sāta kṣauṇī | 17 |
baśiṣṭhe boile sanya gheniṇa basibā biśvāmitre
samaste heṁ baṇḍi bāṇṭi bhmañja anna acchi yete | 18 |
baśiṣṭhe boile pāḍi ho śāḷa patra guḍāẏe
samaste siaṁ danā goṭiẏe goṭiẏe | 19 |
sumantaku boile tu duhaṁ gāī goṭi
meñjana ye nahiṁ debā dudha phuṭi | 20 |
baśiṣṭhaṅkara bhāriyā ye aṭanti arundhatī
bhāta oriẏā se rānddhaṇa achanti | 21 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni ye sehi banaste
tini yojana māḍi basile biśvāmitre | 22 |
baśiṣṭhaṅka celā pañchāśa sahasra ye śiṣi
arundhatī ḍhāḷi dianti ye samste paraśi | 23 |
gāī goṭilkara dudha oriẏā goṭikara bhāte
yāhaku yeteka aṇṭai bhmañjanti samaste | 24 |
dina arddhe rājā muṇohiṁ re bije kalā |
āditya asta yāke muṇohim sarilā | 25 |
samasta saini bhmañja hoile triputri
acheṁbana sāri āstāne bije narapabhi | 26 |
biśvāmitre boile śuṇimā muni he
baḍāi āśrija dekhilu andehe | 27 |
gāī goṭikara dudha oriẏā goṭikara bhāta
ẏeteka aṇṭilā mora sāta kṣauṇī sanya baḷabanta | 28 |
baśiṣṭhi pratibākya śuṇa biśvāmitra rāẏe
āhuri hoiba nā pakhāḷa guḍāẏe | 29 |
biśvāmitra boile śuṇimā tapantiṣṭhi
mote debā ẏe tumbhara gāī goṭi | 30 |
sahasreka dhenu gāba muhiṁ debaiṁ tumbhaṅku
baśiṣṭhe boile loka ke āmbhara sambhāḷibāku | 31 |
ẏekā kāmadhenu mora aṭai yugate
biẏāṇe biāile duhuṁ manuẏe pariyante | 32 |
tu rājā mahā paṇḍita aṭu bhigyaṁbante
brāhmaṇa gāba tu ye haribuṁ kemante | 33 |
śuṇi biśvāmitre tūnī ye hoile
duṣṭa jana māne ye rājāṅku jaṇāile | 34 |
chāla ho ẏebe banasta ṭhābare gopya hoithibā
caribā ṭhābaru gāra aḍāiṇa nebā | 35 |
duṣṭaṅkara bacane ye biśvāmitra rājā
muṁ ẏeṭhāre ruṣiṅki boluthāiṁ teṇe aḍāi nia yā | 36 |
rājāra bacane caḷile bīra duṣṭe
gāī ki bheṭile yāi baitaraṇī nadī taṭe | 37 |
aḍāi nemāku buddhiẏe kale mahārathā
duṣṭanta dekhi kopa kale jagata mātā | 38 |
khuri khāi lāde debī chāhiṁle kopa dr̥ṣṭi
dekhi tā mahābīre kare dhaile yāṭhi | 39 |
dekhiṇa go mātā māile nei śiṅghe
phutile aśva yoddhāẏe paḷābanti bege | 40 |
sahasreka yoddhāẏe ye beḍhithile gāī
rāgeṇa mahādeī māile goḍāi | 41 |
ruṣi yahuṁ gāī na dile māgante
samadaṇḍa gheni āsi beḍhile biśvamitre | 42 |
dekhile yoddhāne samaste chanti paḍi
sukheṇa go mātā nadīre pāṇi heri | 43 |
dekhiṇa āgyāṁ dile biśvāmitra rājā
sainiki boile re aḍāi āṇa yā | 44 |
rājāra bacane dhaiṁle bege thāṭha
gaja aśva yoddhāẏe mahā mahā baḷiṣṭha | 45 |

div.note: sukheṇa go mātā nadīre pāṇi piẏe cari (pā)

heri–haraṇa karibā, gahaṇa karibā, pāna karibā–dhātura
anekārghatva hetu |

lg.l: lakṣe pura kariṇa se beḍhile gāīṅki
go mātāra kopa ye baḍhilā thāṭha dekhi | 46 |
beni śiṅghe hoile tā’ra paraśu tikṣa kāti
niśvāsa bahilā pabana aṇachāśa mūrtti | 47 |
pāda hoile tā’ra asibara asibara tīkṣa mūnā
piṭhira carma tā’ra hoilā bajra sehnā | 48 |
rome hoile debīṅkara asti tīkṣa bāṇa
jhāḍante barṣilā yāi sanyaṅka śarīra upareṇa | 49 |
ghāẏeṇa sanya daṇḍa ye paḍile nimajāi
yama debatā pāñji pocchilā sabunti hiṁ | 50 |
hatyāku bimocana kale sabong saini
rāgeṇa binddhale dhanu śasra gheni | 51 |
śahasramāna paḍile gāīra śatīre
bajra chaurire paḍi ucchuḍanti śare | 52 |
niśvāsa chāḍile debī ati kopabhare
biśvāmitra saini uḍi paḍile apāra dūrare | 53 |
pabana bahilā ki aṇachāśa mūrtti gheni
ye yahiṁ paḍile se loṭile dharaṇī | 54 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa ye biśvāmitraṅkara thilā
ẏekā go mātāra kope samasta nāśa galā | 55 |
tera jaṇa gheni rājā galā sanya bhagna hoi
bhāradvādaśaṅka āśrame prabeśilā yāiṁ | 56 |
bhāradvādaśa boile tora sanya kāhiṁ biśvāmitra
sanyara bihune rājā diśu ta biparīta | 57 |
kāhāra tule rājā hoilu bibādī
sakaḷa bhmabana ta samasta pāru sādhi | 58 |

div.note: pāda ye hoilā candrahāsa tīkha mūnā (pā)
haṭyāku bimocana ye na kale saini | (pā)

lg.l: biśvāmitre kahile ye baśiṣṭhaṅkara kathā
loteṇa hari muṁ āṇuthili tāṅkara go mātā | 59 |
aneka rājā muṁ jiṇili sāṁgrāme
go mātā nāśa kalā mora saini anutrame | 60 |
rājya bhāra morakicchi nohilā mahāgyāṁta
dharma baḷahiṁ se asaṅkhya baḷabantā | 61 |
podu poḍu rājya mora nāhiṁ priẏojana |
ẏete boli chāḍilā se rājya āśāmāna | 62–6832 |

div.head: {@baśiṣṭhiṅkara aṣṭabasuṅka prati abhiśāpa@}

lg.l: samasta tejyā kari tapaku kalā ichā
paśilā dharme rājā amara pada kalā bāñcchā | 1 |
mahāghora tape se basile biśvāmitre
śūnya bhedi talaẏe karanti śuddha citte | 2 |
loha cūri bhakṣalā naba sahasra baraṣa
śūnya puruṣamāne hoile āsi dr̥śya | 3 |
biśvāmitre boile aṣṭabasunta rāi
baśiṣṭhaṅka tahuṁ dia mote kāmadhenu gāī | 4 |
rājaruṣira bacane caḷile aṣṭabasu
baśiṣṭhiṅkara gāī se dekhile āśramare paśuṁ | 5 |
cauryya paṇa dhari paśile niśākāḷe
āśrame paśi gāī pheile bāhu baḷe | 6 |
gāīki oḍāi se nei yāuchanti bane
raẏeṇi prabhāte mandire gāī na dekhile mahāmunye | 7 |
duhiṁbāku loḍile nāhiṁ gāī goṭi
āśrama caukati loḍanti tapaniṣṭhi | 8 |
aneka śrameṇa paḍi loḍanti muni gāī
basuẏe boile ẏemante nemā ye kimpāi | 9 |
mahāmantra dhūḷi pakāi āṇṭe aṣṭabhāi
āpaṇā icchāẏe ye pache goḍāi acchi gāī | 10 |
dr̥mana pabongta ye bānddhale nei gāī
gaṇḍaẏeka māri se saurī bhojana khāi | 11 |
gāīki loḍiṇa yauachanti baśiṣṭhe
bhiṭile gāīki dr̥mana giri nikaṭe | 12 |
dhāīṁ yāiṁ katire bheṭile brahmachārī
āśvāsi gāīki pheile dauḍi | 13 |
pabongte uparuṁ dhāiṁ aile umā basu
baśiṣṭhaṅka upare pitile yāṭhi ye paraśu | 14 |
yāṭhi paḍi muni aṅga mahā byathā pāi
rāgeṇa boile tu thāa re napuṁsaka hoi | 15 |
mañche jāta hua yāiṁ gaṅgāi udare
aputrika hoi nāśa yaa tu bhāratha yuddhare | 16 |
biṣama śāpa pāi umābasu ye galā
śeṣe bhīṣma gaṅgāra putra ye hoilā | 17 |
baśiṣṭhe yāuchanti aḍāiṇa gāī
aniḷa basu dhāiṁ lauḍi ẏeka bulāi | 18 |
aniḷa bsu baśiṣṭhaṅku piṭilā nei bāḍi
baśiṣṭhe boile tu andha hoithāa paḍi | 19 |
se mahātmāra śāpa ye meṇṭaṇa na galā
aniḷeka basu tatakṣaṇe andha ye hoilā | 20 |
aniḷa basu boilā śuṇa he baśiṣṭha
biśvāmitraṅka āgyāṁẏe āmbhe pāilu ẏete kaṣṭa | 21 |
cakṣu mukataku mote kahibā kāraṇa
baśiṣṭhe boile paḍithāa ẏehi banasteṇa | 22 |
dvāpara yuge ẏe araṇye āsibe dharma yujheṣṭhi
tāhāṅku dekhile tohora andha paṭaḷa yiba | phiṭi | 23 |
prāẏeka basu dhāiṁle kopa apramite
baśiṣṭhaṅkara gāī niante dhaile kopa citte | 24 |
gāī dhari baśiṣṭhaṅku pakāile peli
bāḍiẏeka piṭile se aneka manda boli | 25 |
kopeṇa śāpa tāgku dile muni dvija
boile para upugārī hoi jadura ghare huasi dahija | 26 |
puṇi gāī gheni yā’nteṇa tapodhana
āra pāñcha basu dhaāiṁle maha kopa mana | 27 |
lauḍiẏe lauḍiẏe gheni kopeṇa bulāi
baśiṣṭhiṅka upare prahāra kale nei | 28 |
muhiṁ māḍi bhūmire paḍile baśiṣṭhe
gāī gheniṇa yaānti pañcha basu baḷiṣṭhe | 29 |
sāṣṭama hoiṇa muni kale kopa
rāgeṇa basuṅku baśiṣṭhe dile śāpa | 30 |
pāñche heṁ hoa tumbhe gaṅgāṅkara pua
janmilā dina hiṁ tumbhe śiraccheda hoa | 31 |
śāpa dianteṇa basu him apasari
bho baśiṣṭha na jāṇi tohora gāra kalu chori | 32 |
śiraccheda hoibu yebe mātāṅkara haste
mukatiki kāraṇa kahibā tapobante | 33 |
baśiṣṭhe boile e cherāila ẏe mohora gāba
beni janme tumbhe re mukata hoiba | 34 |
gaṅgāra hāthe śira chedana hoiba bāḷakāḷe
puṇa janma hoiba śabaruṇīra koḷe | 35 |
aja śabara nāme tumbhara hoiba tāta
sehi kirāta upare paḍiba bajra nirghāta | 36 |
mātā tumbhara tumbhanta gheni paḷāiba
bāru ṇābante yaiṁ jadura ghare āujiba | 37 |
jadura ghare dahana hoiba sehi rāti
tahiṁ tumbhe dahana hoiba pāñcha mūrtti | 38 |
āre aṣṭabasu tumbhe cherāila mohora gāba
goru cherā nāma tumbhanta rahu chari yuga | 39 |
badanti agasti śuṇa manu mahā dhārmika
kahanteṇa kathā ye na sarai aneka | 40 |
aho baśiṣṭhaṅka śāpyeṇa aṣṭa basu
jadu ghare chaḍa basu śarīra kale pāṁśu | 41 |
śuddhāṅga sādhyāṅga bhigyaṁ bhābyabanta
sabonggyaṁ prāgyaṁ ẏe chaḍa basu saṅgeta | 42 |
śabaruṇī putra hoi pañcha basu hoile dahana
prāẏe basu dahana hoile paṇḍā purañchana | 43 |
aniḷa basu andha hoi paḍi acchi bane
se mukati hoiba yujheṣṭhiṅka daraśane | 44 |
umā basu gaṅgāra putra bhīṣma mahātejā
yujheṣṭhi nimante bhāratha yuddhe karibe śaraśayyā | 45 |
ẏemāne aṣṭa basu aṭanti goru chera
pāṇḍabaṅkara nimante dhvaṁsibe śarīra | 46 |
baśiṣṭhaṅkara kāryya nāhiṁ ehāṅkara kāryye ẏe hoileka hata
lg.note: śuddhāṅga, sādhyāṅga, bhiñja, bhāgyabanta, subhaṅga, jibhaṅga
lg.l: śuṇiṇa parama sānanda hoile manu kalpa rājā
agastiṅka padma pāde kaleka padya arghya pūjā | 48 |
sādhu mahātmā tumbhe parama paṇḍita agasti
amr̥ta rasa mahabhāratha śuṇi pāili parama gati | 49 |
manu boile ẏemāne samaste hoile dahana
gopyāne pāṇḍabe ye galeka ghora bana | 50 |
ẏethira bāratā se pāilāka kurupati
kisa kisa boile sabhāẏe kahibā mahāyati | 51–6883 |
lg.head:
{@pāṇḍabaṅka mr̥tyu śuṇi dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅkara śoka
o preta kriẏā sādhana@}
lg.l: badanti agasti kumbha ruṣiṅkara tanu
kaḷi kāḷa dhvaṁsanimante śuṇa baibasuta manu | 1 |
rātrare jadu gr̥ha hoilāka dahana
paḷāiṇa gale jhimāṇiśāḷa loka māna | 2 |
sambhabonge āsthāne bijaẏe kurupati
karapatra yoḍiṇa ḍagaraẏe bāratā kahanti | 3 |
svāmī pāṇḍabe thile ye jadua ghare rahi
āja rātra kāḷe deba hoile sabonge dahi | 4 |
purañchana paṇḍā tāṅka saṅgate śoithilā
tāhāṅkara saṅgate se dahana hoilā | 5 |
ẏesaneka bāratā śuṇi rājā kurupati
mūrcchāgate paḍilā se mānacatrabratī | 6 |
dhuśāsana dr̥jaẏe eka uttara śate bhrātha
śajasramta pakāi ye hoile mūrcchāgata | 7 |
bhurisabongāẏe śuṇile ye bhīṣma mahārathī
śalya kr̥pa śaṅkani sañjaẏe kurupati | 8 |
bhitare bāratā ye pāile dhr̥tarāṣṭe
bajra ghāte prāẏe paḍile aceṣṭe | 9 |
thāna māna nicaḷa rāẏe asāṣṭame acchi paḍi
nija prāṇa niścaḷa ki prāṇa galā chāḍi | 10 |
svāmīki koḷi kari dhaile gāndhārī
mukhe jaḷa nei siñchile paribārī | 11 |
koḷa kari mantrībara dhailā sañjaẏe
keśa bāsa asambhāḷa cetana nāhiṁ kururāẏe | 12 |
āhā putra bolai robai dhr̥tarāṣṭa
ẏetekāḷe dhātā mote dilāka putra kaṣṭa | 13 |
putranta pāḷili muhiṁ paṇḍura abhābo
ẏethi dvanda pramāda hoi boli muṁ thoili āna ṭhābe | 14 |
jagata mohana bābu jagata tāraṇa nāma goṭi
anāstara bāndhaba mohora dukhīra saṅghāta yujheṣṭhi | 15 |
ajāta śatr̥ bābu sabonggyaṁ sudharma
āre mohora bābu arjjuna bīra bhīma | 16 |
baḷabantā śakatā ye dhārmika buddhibantā
para loka bāndhaba bābhiẏe abhaẏe raṇajitā | 17 |
anāthara nātha bābu mora andhara lauḍi
ẏekahuṁ jāta andha ābara duguṇe kaṣṭa paḍi | 18 |
bābu pāṇḍabāsura māri uddharilu karubongśa
pāṇḍaba nāma tumbhanta dile ye tridaśa | 19 |
hā hā re nandana mora keuṁṇa kati galu
gabhīra somodre mohora bheḷā buḍāilu | 20 |
dukhīra saṅghātare mohora prāṇa pañchubhūte
muhiṁ tumbhara apāda gheni yāiṁ re pañchuputra | 21 |
deba loke tumbhanta kale yahuṁ janma
kebaṇa pāpa doṣe nāśa galāka ẏeḍe dharma | 22 |
āre bābu mohora nandana arjuna re dutīkr̥ṣṇa phālaguni
ẏe nāma goṭi dile kr̥ṣṇa koḷe tote gheni | 23 |
bābu ẏe kauṁ hīna jība ābara dukha upare dukha
muhiṁ brati chāṇḍāḷa chāhiṁbi kāhā mukha | 24 |
bāḷa bhāba chāḍi putre ābara hoila re yubā
oho kuḷa buḍāiṇa keṇe gala bābā | 25 |
robai gāndhārī dhr̥tarāṣṭara pāṭarāṇī
bhumire paḍai debī yehne bajraghāta jāṇi | 26 |
bajraghāte śarīra mohora houcchi bidāri
poḍu mohora śarīra kemante thibi dhari | 27 |
andha paṭaḷa bānddhali kāhāri dukha na dekhibāku
kaṣṭa upare kaṣṭa na galā hāde muku | 28 |
āre āre bābu ẏe mohora nakuḷa sahadeba
sulakṣaṇa buddhi goṭi yāhāra amr̥ta rasa bhāba | 29 |
bābu chālante śohai re mohora pañchu kaṭaka purī
āstāna śohai yehne bijaẏe murāri | 30 |
pramādara ḍare tumbhanta bābu luchāili nei
sampoḍe nāśa gala mohora hīna buddhire tahiṁ | 31 |
bābu re āmbhanta maraṇa huantā tumbhara āge
nilaja ātmā kimpe na tuṭai puta śoge | 32 |
putre kimpā nāśa gale mātā pitā thauṁ thaiṁ
bho daiba puruṣa ẏehā bhiāṇa kalu kāhuṁ | 33 |
lg.note: āstāne basile śohai yesane amara purī |
bhāthā ābara putra chāhiṁbu kāhāra mukha
he daiba putra kaṣṭa dilu ẏete dukha |
lg.l: āgo kointā tu ye mohora prāṇa sakhī
tohora putrahuṁ adhika mohora putre dekhi | 34 |
āmbhe ta basilu ye hoi andha ye andhuṇī
ẏehu pañchu kaṭakare tuhi se ṭhākurāṇī | 35 |
kāhāku samarpilu tohoara ẏeḍeka sampada
meṇṭita na pārilu go karma bipada | 36 |
darāṇḍa hoiṇa andha ye bāhara hoi āsi
keuṁṇa agāde paśibi śarīra mora jhāsi | 37 |
ke mote kaḍhāiṇa neba jadura ghare
andha andhuṇī dahi hoibu putraṅka saṅgatare | 38 |
driyodhana boilā tāta trodhare nuha bāi
dahija galā śarīra ābara loḍile kāhiṁ pāi | 39 |
tu tāhāṅkara guṇa jāṇuṭiki pitā
āmbhanta māilā se pāṇḍabā daitā | 40 |
nadīre paśi deha pakhāḷucchi khāiba boli sabunti
ẏemantara samaẏe yāiṁ bheṭile suta kuntī | 41 |
muhiṁ tāhānta tāta kariacchi aneka ye pāpa
se kathā śarīre ye na bahile garutāpa | 42 |
yuddhare mārile se pāṇḍabāsuraku
amr̥ta deiṇa tāta jiāile āmbhaṅku | 43 |
kalā upugāra ye na sumaranti jana
abaśya huanti se narake patana | 44 |
ẏesaneka sakha ye aṭanti mohora sohodre
ẏehenneka pāpa karma pitā mote paḍilā hāde | 45 |
jārā śabara māilā ye āmbhanta bāḷa kāḷe
droṇa guru thānte se mote uddharile beḷe | 46 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ driyodhana ye paḍilā mahī loṭi
krodhe paḍi gaḍiṇa yāuchanti dhr̥tarāṣṭa dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 47 |
śate bhāiṅkara trodha kahi ta ki pāri
nirghāta bāṇa ki paḍuacchi aṅge sabuṅkari | 48 |
pāṇḍabaṅkara bihune mora jībane kāryya kisa
ẏehikṣaṇi bhakṣibi mote ke āṇi deba biṣa | 49 |
deha miḷāu mora ye arjunara kaṣṭa dekhi
tohora abhābe bābu re hoili nirimākhi | 50 |
daśa diśa mote andhāra diśilā
śarada candramāku ki rāhu garāsilā | 51 |
ura śira driyodhana pāṣaṇeṇa koḍi
koḷa kari gāṅgeba dhaile tāku bhiḍi | 52 |
bhurisabongẏe dhari achanti dhuśāsanaku
sañjaẏe dhari achanti andha ye rājāku | 53 |
rādhā dhari acchi ye gāndharasena duhitāku | 54 |
bidura mahātamā kahai śānti buddhi
raha raha driyodhana tu anamitte nohasi trodhī | 55 |
āmbhara deha na sahai tohora trodha kale
pāṇḍabe āsibe ki tohora nāśa gale | 56 |
samaste maribā ki ho pāṇḍabaṅkara pāiṁ
ke pāru yujheṣṭhiki āṇunā jīāiṁ | 57 |
apramita troma karanti sabong miḷi
brahmāṇḍa uchuḷucchi asaṅkhya bobāḷi | 58 |
samasta rajyare bāratā kahile deśāure
pāṇḍabe dahana hoile bāruṇābanta jadura ghare | 59 |
droṇe thile ye tripurāntaka pabongte
tapa dharma upekhi āsanti śīghragate | 60 |
prabeśa hoile āsi hastinā bhmabane
biduraṅku pachāranti bhāradvādaśaṅkara nāne | 61 |
loẏe andha sabuṅkari cakṣu beni
droṇa guru boli kehi na pārile cihna | 62 |
biduraṅku droṇe pachāranti ẏekānte
tohora thānte pāṇḍabe nāśagale kemante | 63 |
bidura boile bhīma dhuśāsana yahyṁ hoile aprīti
puanta gheni apasarile debī ye kointī | 64 |
bāruṇābante yāiṁ rahile aneka suste
pramada upujilā karmara ghaṭa sūtre | 65 |
bidura nirāśa bacana śuṇi doṇa guru
śarīra biartha kale arjuna sumaru sumaru | 66 |
dhāiṁ yāi kol akari dhaile aśastamā
bho pitā tumbhe noha asaṣṭama ātmā | 67 |
bidura boile ho samaste thira hoi raha
paṇḍita paṇa kari kimpā jaṇe heṁ na kaha | 68 |
paḷāibā lokaṅku ki bikaḷa hoibā
dūta baragibā ki āpaṇe loḍibā | 69 |
śaba paḍiacchi prāṇa galā chāḍi
tahiṁ ki upāẏa karibā hibya mauṣodhi loḍi | ? 70 |
agni dahija kalā sabuṅkari gātra
kāẏā bhasma hoilā kāḷa yahiṁ ta prāpata | 71 |
dahana pāna puruṣa se grāsilāka āpaṇa
tahiṁki trodha kara kebaṇa kāraṇa | 72 |
raha raha kurunātha chāḍi mela śoka
kisa tote bujhāibi tu ki aṭu mūrkha | 73 |

div.note: karmara anarthe, karmara āẏatte, karmara alaṅghite, karamara citre |

lg.l: bābu chāḍi mela trodha mohabaddha cintā
thira hoi rahi ki yāānta patha śrantā | 74 |
kāḷa boli kari ho yebaṇa puruṣa
nirdaẏā nirāpakṣa se kāhākuhiṁ nohe baśva | 75 |
tāhāku jāṇimāku ẏethe ke acchi samaratha
kimpā aneka rājya siṁhāsana chāḍile biśvāmitra | 76 |
sabong sukha chāḍi parityaja chāḍile sukha bhogī
chāḍile jañjāḷa se hoile parama yogī | 77 |
sodara nidhane se aneka kaṣṭa boli
ke ẏethe amara acchi samaste maribā kāli | 78 |
āho baḍa bhāgyabantā se pāṇḍabe puṇya dehī
kāhāri kaṣṭa na dekhi dharma pathe gale āga hoi | 79 |
kehu āge kehu abā hoi thāi pacha
bahanta pāthaku kimpā aragaḷi deuacha | 80 |
ārambhe murāṭa hoa trodha chāḍi mela
para rāṣṭraku ẏete trodha kale nohai bhala | 81 |
hari baḷarāma ye bijaẏe raibrata pabongte
indra ucchaba yātrā bidhane yadu bhoja samaste | 82 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe milīle munehi
ugrasenara āstane bāratā yāi kahi | 83 |
svāmī pāṇḍabe thile bāruṇābanta jadura ghare
kointā ādi kari dahana hoile pāṇḍaba pañchubīre | 84 |
deśāura tahuṁ ẏesana bāratā śuṇi
ugrasene jaṇāilā deba catrapāṇi | 85 |
śuṇa deba yadubīra biparīta baratā
jadura ghare nāśagale pañchu paṇḍabe ābara kointā | 86 |
lokate cakita hoile catrapāṇi
puṇi chadrame kāndanti loṭiṇa dharaṇī 87 |
yahuṁ āpaṇe apāra śoka kale śrīpuruṣottama
nāraẏaṇaṅku śānti karānti deba baḷarāma | | 88 |
baḷarāma bāsudeba aneka bikaḷa
puṇa puṇa niceṣṭa deba kāmapāḷa | 89 |
hā hā yujheṣṭhi boli bolanti haḷapati
adoṣe nāśa gala karmara bipatti | 90 |
sañchaẏe pāṇḍabe yebe hoile prāṇabhraṣṭa
aneka kaṣṭa pāiba nr̥pati dhr̥tiraṣṭa | 91 |
badaẏanti saṅtriṣeṇa śuṇa ho janārddana
dhr̥tirāṣṭa tahiṁki yibāṭiki pāṇi daraśana | 92 |
dāruka sātyaki hakāri bolanti debarāja
tāḷadhvaja nandighoṣa bega kari sāja | 93 |
nārāchāṇaṅka āgyāṁẏe beni ye sārathi
aneka ratna se rathare maṇḍanti | 94 |
tāḷadhvaja ratha sājai dāruka
upare subarṇṇa bandhā śveta chāmara ẏeka lakṣa | 95 |
ḍāḷimba neta ye lambānti causarā
śate sari māṇikya mukutā māḷamāna jahrā | 96 |
netara cirāḷa pātāṅga ye phiriphiranti bāẏe
chāri koṇe dāsīnetara ālamba śaẏe śaẏe | 97 |
subarṇṇa kāṭhire aṣṭa ratneṇa uddaṇḍa
ḍaḷanti baiḍuryye nīḷā ratneṇa chārikāṇḍa | 98 |
sahasre sahasre patani hīrā kanakare jaḍi
pherakeṇa gajamukutā pāñcha pāñcha sari | 99 |
tathira saṅgate marakata dhāḍi dhāḍi
ratna pāṭiẏā upare māṇikya darpaṇa acchi jaḍi | 100 |
śate mukutāre māṇikya puñji puñji
taruṇa āditya teja prabhātare gañji | 101 |
rathara chārikati subarṇṇara ghaṇṭikā
parimaḷa śabade ye jhaṭakanti ratanara śikhā | 102 |
śukaḷa patani raṅga patani dāsīneta tule
gaja bandha mānanta nei upare rañchile | 103 |
tāḷadhvaja rathe subrṇṇa ahibrateka lambi
yesaneka amara sabhā diśai ārambi | 104 |
rathara chāri pīḍha subarṇṇara koṇa kāṇḍa
jhaṭakanti hīrāẏe yehne udaẏa mārataṇḍa | 105 |
ẏesaneka svarūpa ye tāladhvaja ratha śobhā
kubera bhmabana jāṇi candrakiraṇa prabhā | 106 |
śveta ananta gokṣura śārdduḷa chāri bājī
kaḷapī haẏe ye aṭanti mahātejī | 107 |
ẏekā nimiṣake tailokya pāranti khepi
mahāyāguṁ sambhūta haẏe aanti kamarūpī | 108 |
tāhāṅkara mūḷe sahasre sahasre bājī
chekhāra turaṅgama se pabanu bega teji | 109 |
ẏe aśvanta yocilā nei hāruka sārathi
śeṇā pakṣī prāẏe se khepanti gagana gati | 110 |
tāḷadhvaja rathe bijaẏe kāmapāḷa
śrībhmaje śobhamāna svāmīra saunanda mūṣaḷa | 111 |
rebatīra ballabha svāmī pratagyāṁ sāmarathā deba haḷī | 112 |
lg.note: jhaṇa jahṇita śabada ye jhaṭakanti ratna śikhā |
lg.l: śirare sīmantha kaṭire mekhaḷā pabitrā
nīḷa basan ābharaṇa svāmī lohita barṇṇa netrā | 113 |
yātrā maṅgaḷa suyoge śubha anakūḷe
bhmajaṅga maṇḍaṇa svāmī bijaẏe kāmapāḷe | 114 |
dāruka maṇḍilā ye nandighoṣa ratha
aneka sambhare svāmī bijaẏe jagannātha | 115 |
śeta gokṣīra śaṅkha kāmapāḷa chāri haẏe
jaḷa bāraṇa anaḷa nistāraṇa kāẏe | 116 |
śrībhmaje śaṅkha catra śāraṅga kaumodī
bije jagamohana svāmī parama sānandī | 117 |
uḍanti haẏabara pabana gati jāṇi
dekhiṇa aneka sānanda deba dinakara maṇi | 118 |
bāhānti turaṅgama se beni sārathi
hastinā bhmabane bije kr̥ṣṇa haḷapati | 119 |
amaṅgaḷa bhmabana ye diśai nārakhāra
kaḷaha āstāna prāẏe sebanti kurubīra | 120 |
śrīkhaṇḍa candana māna gobindara kāẏe
trodha bhare nr̥pati hoicchi reṇu maẏe | 121 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa driyodhana saburi kaṣṭa dekhi
āsanti beni bhrāthe yāna bāhānanta upekhi | 122 |
sañjaẏe kahile śuṇa dhr̥tarāṣṭe
svāmī sannidhye tohora bije kale rāma kr̥ṣṇe | 123 |
ambikāra nandana kahai śoka bhare kathā
ẏeheneka bipada svāmī bihilā mote dhātā | 124 |
bhīma dhuśāsana yahuṁ hoile anyāanyi
muhiṁ ẏekānte bhāḷili yujheṣṭhiṅki gheni | 125 |
ẏekaṭhāre thile bābu hoiba anyāanyi
bābuṇābante raha yāiṁ bhāinta tora gheni | 126 |
gurujana bacane deba alaṅghita yujheṣṭhi
bāruṇābnte rahile mora putra pāñcha goṭi | 127 |
kāli rātre deba mote paḍilā bipada
se pañchu putraṅku hāde paḍilā paramāda | 128 |
jhimāṇiśāḷu agni paḍi deba pura dahana hoilā
kointā sahite mora pañchu putra nāśa galā | 129 |
bināśa kāḷaku dekha biparīta buddhi
bipada karmeṇa mohora ẏesaneka luhi bidhi | 130 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ mr̥kṣāgata hoile dhr̥tarāṣṭa
raha raha kurupati boli dhaile jagannātha | 131 |
jagujana bandhu ye jagata jana hitakarī
kebaṇa pātake mote ẏeḍeka bipatti paḍi | 132 |
driyodhana asāṣṭama baḷarāmaṅka mukha dekhi
beḷeka sodaranta svāmī na pārilu rakhi | 133 |
śrīhari boile tumbhe śuṇa kurupati
daiba kr̥tye tote hoilā anīta | 134 |
baḷarame boile kāhiṁ dahana hoile pāṇḍabe
chāla ho dekhiyibā bolanti baḷadebe | 135 |
rāmara bacane saja hoile kuruthāṭha
aneka gahaḷa ye hoilā murāṭa | 136 |
yadura ghara dekhibāku yāānti saini
mahāteja hoi ye dahu acchi agni | 137 |
biduraku ẏekānte pachāranti janārddana
pāṇḍabaṅkara carita ho kebaṇa bidhāna | 138 |
bidure boile deba galeni pāra hoi
araṇye paśileni ye ẏehāṅku gocara nāhiṁ | 139 |
bho nātha nārāẏaṇa tu manda kr̥tya kalu
ẏe jadura ghara dekhāi kimpā ẏehāṅku āṇilu | 140 |
ẏethire dahana houchanti śabaruṇī pañchu putre
na puṇa cihnanti ẏe dekhile nija gātre | 141 |
śrīhari trāsile ye bidura bacane
sundri śeṇa catre peṣile agni dahana sthāne | 142 |
na cihnantu kuru bīre duguṇa teja bahu
bāsudebara māẏā ho jāṇimāka kehu | 143 |
ẏe se māẏādhara ho mahāmāẏā rañchanā
bhārā nibāribāku ẏe kūṭa upaẏe sinā | 144 |
śrīhari boile ho śuṇa kurupati
mr̥tu piṇḍa gandha lāgile śirī hoẏe kṣati | 145 |
dure thāi dekhanti samasta bīramāne
dekhuchanti chaḍa piṇḍa houchanti dahane | 146 |
hā hā daiba boli ye paḍilā kurupati
bhīṣma, dorṇa, karṇṇa, bhurisabongā, śalya, aśastama sabong kṣe | 147 |
driyodhana śate bhrāthe ābara kurudebe
samaste bajra ghate paḍile pāṇḍabaṅkara abhābe | 148 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇa smārjanā karanti sabunti
gobinde badanti ho trodha kara śānti | 149 |
trodha śānti kara ho ambikāra suta
aneka trodha abastā tote acchini bahuta | 150 |
lg.note:
aneka trodha abastā tote acchini bahuta –
adhaṭhā pāṭha –
lg.l: apāra kuṭumba tu ye arajilu dhr̥tarāṣṭa
mohora bichāre tote hoiba aneka kaṣṭa | 151 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭā driyodhanaku śānti ye karāi
bāhuḍi hastinā bhmabanaku āsanti kurusāiṁ | 152 |
preta kāryya karibāku yesaneka bidhi
sāṅsārika dharmaku rājā yesaneka hoi siddhi | 153 |
karanti kurubīre pretakāryya bidhāna
rahile yadu nandana kuru rājāra āstāna | 154 |
naba dibasa pariyante aneka dāna dile
daśāha śrāddha kari ẏekādaśa piṇḍa bhiāile | 155 |
homa karmeṇa karānti ghr̥ta pāka
pāraṇā āchebana śuddha ye pātraka | 156–7039 |
